parts.name: Picture description
parts.title: For each question, you will see a picture and you will hear four short statements. The statements will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book so you must listen carefully to understand what the speaker says. When you hear the four statements, look at the picture and choose the statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Choose the best answer A, B, C or D

intro.title:
EXAMPLE:
Now listen to the four statements.
Statement (D) best describes what you see in the picture.
Therefore, you should choose answer (D).
intro.answers: ["A. He is on the phone","B. She is driving the car","C. She is typing on the computer","D. He is sitting next to her"]

questions.text_audio:
A. He’s fishing from a pier.
B. He’s boarding a boat.
C. He’s reading a book.
D. He’s picking up a backpack.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. Anh ta \u0111ang câu cá \u1edf b\u1ebfn tàu.<\/p>

B. Anh ta \u0111ang lên tàu.<\/p>

C. Anh ta \u0111ang \u0111\u1ecdc sách.<\/p>

D. Anh ta \u0111ang nh\u1eb7t m\u1ed9t cái ba lô.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"C. Anh ta \u0111ang \u0111\u1ecdc s\u00e1ch."}

questions.text_audio:
A. She’s looking through a purse.
B. She’s holding a suitcase.
C. She’s hanging a poster.
D. She’s putting an umbrella into a basket.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. C\u00f4 \u1ea5y \u0111ang nh\u00ecn v\u00e0o m\u1ed9t c\u00e1i v\u00ed.<\/p>

B. C\u00f4 \u1ea5y \u0111ang c\u1ea7m m\u1ed9t c\u00e1i vali.<\/p>

C. C\u00f4 \u1ea5y \u0111ang treo m\u1ed9t t\u1ea5m \u00e1p ph\u00edch.<\/p>

D. C\u00f4 \u1ea5y \u0111ang \u0111\u1eb7t \u00f4 v\u00e0o gi\u1ecf.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"C\u00f4 \u1ea5y \u0111ang \u0111\u1eb7t \u00f4 v\u00e0o gi\u1ecf","en":"She\u2019s putting an umbrella into a basket"}

questions.text_audio:
A. A rug is being rolled up.
B. A door is being installed.
C. A floor is being mopped.
D. A wall is being torn down
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. M\u1ed9t cái th\u1ea3m \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cu\u1ed9n l\u1ea1i.<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t cánh c\u1eeda \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t cái sàn \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c lau.<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t b\u1ee9c t\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111ang b\u1ecb phá h\u1ee7y.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"M\u1ed9t c\u00e1i th\u1ea3m \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cu\u1ed9n l\u1ea1i","en":"A rug is being rolled up"}

questions.text_audio:
A. Some flowers are being planted.
B. Some leaves have been raked into a pile.
C. Some stairs are being repaired.
D. Some fruit has been stacked in a bin
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. M\u1ed9t vài bông hoa \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1ed3ng.<\/p>

B. Vài chi\u1ebfc lá \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cào thành m\u1ed9t ch\u1ed3ng.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t vài b\u1eadc thang \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa.<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t vài qu\u1ea3 trái cây \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1ebfp ch\u1ed3ng lên nhau<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"M\u1ed9t v\u00e0i qu\u1ea3 tr\u00e1i c\u00e2y \u0111\u00e3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1ebfp ch\u1ed3ng l\u00ean nhau","en":"Some fruit has been stacked in a bin"}

questions.text_audio:
A. A woman is typing on a keyboard.
B. A woman is plugging a cord into a machine.
C. A man is standing in front of a desk.
D. A man is reaching for a coffee mug.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. M\u1ed9t ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang gõ vào bàn phím.<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang c\u1eafm dây vào m\u1ed9t cái máy.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang \u0111\u1ee9ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc bàn làm vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang v\u1edb t\u1edbi m\u1ed9t c\u1ed1c cà phê.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u00e0n \u00f4ng \u0111ang \u0111\u1ee9ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc b\u00e0n l\u00e0m vi\u1ec7c","en":"A man is standing in front of a desk"}

questions.text_audio:
A. One of the men is climbing a ladder.
B. One of the men is lifting a wooden plank.
C. One of the men is sweeping a walkway.
D. One of the men is tying rope to a pole
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang leo lên thang.<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang nâng m\u1ed9t t\u1ea5m ván g\u1ed7.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang quét \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng v\u1ec9a hè.<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang c\u1ed9t dây vào m\u1ed9t cái sào<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u00e0n \u00f4ng \u0111ang n\u00e2ng m\u1ed9t t\u1ea5m v\u00e1n g\u1ed7.","en":"One of the men is lifting a wooden plank."}

parts.name: Question - response
parts.title: In this part of the test, you will hear a question or statement spoken in English, followed by three responses, also spoken in English. The question or statement and the responses will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book, so you must listen carefully. You are to choose the best response to each question or statement.

intro.title:
You will hear:
Why are you late?
intro.answers: ["A. I hope I won't be","B. My car broke down","C. He alway is"]
intro.explains: The best response is choice B. "My car broke down". Therefore, you should choose B.

questions.text_audio:
Do you think it'll rain tomorrow?
A. Yes, probably.
B. Let me show you how.
C. No, he can't.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

B\u1ea1n có ngh\u0129 là mai tr\u1eddi s\u1ebd m\u01b0a không?<\/p>

A. \u1eea, có l\u1ebd là v\u1eady.<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 tôi cho b\u1ea1n xem.<\/p>

C. Không, anh ta không th\u1ec3 làm v\u1eady.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"B\u1ea1n c\u00f3 ngh\u0129 l\u00e0 mai tr\u1eddi s\u1ebd m\u01b0a kh\u00f4ng?  A. \u1eea, c\u00f3 l\u1ebd l\u00e0 v\u1eady."}

questions.text_audio:
When will the new building be finished?
A. Across from the pharmacy.
B. For the new meeting room.
C. By the end of the month.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Khi nào thì tòa nhà m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn thành?<\/p>

A. \u1ede phía bên kia ti\u1ec7m thu\u1ed1c.<\/p>

B. Cho phòng h\u1ecdp m\u1edbi.<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1ebfn cu\u1ed1i tháng.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Khi n\u00e0o th\u00ec t\u00f2a nh\u00e0 m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ho\u00e0n th\u00e0nh? C. \u0110\u1ebfn cu\u1ed1i th\u00e1ng"}

questions.text_audio:
How was the fund-raising event yesterday?
A. Yes, at eight o'clock.
B. It was very successful.
C. The Wilson Hotel.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n gây qu\u1ef9 hôm qua th\u1ebf nào r\u1ed3i?<\/p>

A. Vâng, lúc 8 gi\u1edd.<\/p>

B. Nó \u0111ã di\u1ec5n ra r\u1ea5t thành công.<\/p>

C. Khách s\u1ea1n Wilson.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n g\u00e2y qu\u1ef9 h\u00f4m qua th\u1ebf n\u00e0o r\u1ed3i? B. N\u00f3 \u0111\u00e3 di\u1ec5n ra r\u1ea5t th\u00e0nh c\u00f4ng"}

questions.text_audio:
Where is a good place for a quick lunch?
A. Yes, I won the race.
B. The sandwich shop next door.
C. About four dollars.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Có bi\u1ebft ch\u1ed7 \u0103n tr\u01b0a nào nhanh mà ngon không?<\/p>

A. Ph\u1ea3i, tôi \u0111ã th\u1eafng cu\u1ed9c \u0111ua.<\/p>

B. Ti\u1ec7m bánh sandwich k\u1ebf bên.<\/p>

C. Kho\u1ea3ng 4 \u0111ô.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"C\u00f3 bi\u1ebft ch\u1ed7 \u0103n tr\u01b0a n\u00e0o nhanh m\u00e0 ngon kh\u00f4ng? B. Ti\u1ec7m b\u00e1nh sandwich k\u1ebf b\u00ean."}

questions.text_audio:
Don't you work upstairs?
A. She Prefers to take the stairs.
B. I don't use it very well.
C. No, my office is on this floor.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Anh không làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf l\u1ea7u trên à?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y thích \u0111i c\u1ea7u thang h\u01a1n.<\/p>

B. Tôi không dùng nó th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên l\u1eafm.<\/p>

C. Không, v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a tôi n\u1eb1m \u1edf t\u1ea7ng này.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh kh\u00f4ng l\u00e0m vi\u1ec7c \u1edf l\u1ea7u tr\u00ean \u00e0? C. Kh\u00f4ng, v\u0103n ph\u00f2ng c\u1ee7a t\u00f4i n\u1eb1m \u1edf t\u1ea7ng n\u00e0y"}

questions.text_audio:
You submitted the travel requestm, didn't you?
A. Yes, this morning.
B. Fifteen and Greene Street.
C. That would be OK.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

B\u1ea1n \u0111ã n\u1ed9p \u0111\u01a1n xin du l\u1ecbch r\u1ed3i ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>

A. Vâng, vào sáng nay.<\/p>

B. S\u1ed1 15 và ph\u1ed1 Greene.<\/p>

C. V\u1eady thì \u1ed5n r\u1ed3i.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"B\u1ea1n \u0111\u00e3 n\u1ed9p \u0111\u01a1n xin du l\u1ecbch r\u1ed3i ph\u1ea3i kh\u00f4ng?  A. V\u00e2ng, v\u00e0o s\u00e1ng nay."}

questions.text_audio:
Who's going to take notes at Thursday's meeting?
A. Several pages.
B. I'll be on vacation then.
C. The charger is broken.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Ai s\u1ebd làm công vi\u1ec7c ghi chú vào bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdp th\u1ee9 n\u0103m?<\/p>

A. Vài trang.<\/p>

B. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111i ngh\u1ec9 mát vào lúc \u0111ó.<\/p>

C. C\u1ee5c s\u1ea1c b\u1ecb h\u1ecfng.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ai s\u1ebd l\u00e0m c\u00f4ng vi\u1ec7c ghi ch\u00fa v\u00e0o bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdp th\u1ee9 n\u0103m? B. T\u00f4i s\u1ebd \u0111i ngh\u1ec9 m\u00e1t v\u00e0o l\u00fac \u0111\u00f3"}

questions.text_audio:
Why can't we replace the computers?
A. The copies are in black and white.
B. Because the budget's not big enough.
C. On the table is fine.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao chúng ta không th\u1ec3 thay máy tính?<\/p>

A. B\u1ea3n sao có màu \u0111en và tr\u1eafng.<\/p>

B. Vì không có \u0111\u1ee7 ngân sách.<\/p>

C. Trên bàn thì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u1ea1i sao ch\u00fang ta kh\u00f4ng th\u1ec3 thay m\u00e1y t\u00ednh? B. V\u00ec kh\u00f4ng c\u00f3 \u0111\u1ee7 ng\u00e2n s\u00e1ch"}

questions.text_audio:
Shouldn't we update our company logo?
A. No, we'll have to get approval first.
B. That date is convenient.
C. I go there often.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chúng ta có nên c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt logo công ty không?<\/p>

A. Không, chúng ta ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn tr\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p>

B. Ngày \u0111ó thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n.<\/p>

C. Tôi th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ó.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ch\u00fang ta c\u00f3 n\u00ean c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt logo c\u00f4ng ty kh\u00f4ng?  A. Kh\u00f4ng, ch\u00fang ta ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn tr\u01b0\u1edbc."}

questions.text_audio:
When are they going to hire someone to fill the open position?
A. Would you like coffee or tea?
B. I think I left my office door open.
C. There are three people left to interview.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Khi nào thì h\u1ecd s\u1ebd thuê ai \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn v\u1ecb trí còn tr\u1ed1ng?<\/p>

A. B\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n u\u1ed1ng cà phê hay trà?<\/p>

B. Tôi ngh\u0129 tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1eeda v\u0103n phòng m\u1edf.<\/p>

C. Còn ba ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Khi n\u00e0o th\u00ec h\u1ecd s\u1ebd thu\u00ea ai \u0111\u00f3 \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn v\u1ecb tr\u00ed c\u00f2n tr\u1ed1ng? C. C\u00f2n ba ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n"}

questions.text_audio:
I heard Fatima is presenting her proposal today.
A. Sure, I will.
B. We bought them each a present.
C. Oh, I thought that was tomorrow.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Tôi nghe nói Fatima \u0111ang trình bày ki\u1ebfn ngh\u1ecb c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y hôm nay.<\/p>

A. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, tôi s\u1ebd làm.<\/p>

B. Chúng tôi mua cho m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u1ecd m\u1ed9t món quà.<\/p>

C. Ô, tôi t\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111ó là ngày mai.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u00f4i nghe n\u00f3i Fatima \u0111ang tr\u00ecnh b\u00e0y ki\u1ebfn ngh\u1ecb c\u1ee7a c\u00f4 \u1ea5y h\u00f4m nay. C. T\u00f4i t\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u00f3 l\u00e0 ng\u00e0y mai"}

questions.text_audio:
Why don't we invite Ms. Li to the business dinner?
A. I do have her e-mail address.
B. A bowl of vegetable soup
C. I'm sorry, I thought I returned it.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Sao chúng ta không m\u1eddi cô Li \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1eefa t\u1ed1i bàn công vi\u1ec7c?<\/p>

A. Tôi có \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 e-mail c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y.<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t bát súp rau c\u1ee7<\/p>

C. Xin l\u1ed7i, tôi t\u01b0\u1edfng là tôi \u0111ã tr\u1ea3 nó r\u1ed3i.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Sao ch\u00fang ta kh\u00f4ng m\u1eddi c\u00f4 Li \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1eefa t\u1ed1i b\u00e0n c\u00f4ng vi\u1ec7c? A. T\u00f4i c\u00f3 \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 e-mail c\u1ee7a c\u00f4 \u1ea5y"}

questions.text_audio:
What repair work needs to be done on this car?
A. Yes, that's right.
B. I haven't finished checking it.
C. No thanks, I can walk.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Vi\u1ec7c s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa nào c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n trên chi\u1ebfc xe này?<\/p>

A. \u0110úng v\u1eady.<\/p>

B. Tôi ch\u01b0a ki\u1ec3m tra xong.<\/p>

C. Không c\u1ea3m \u01a1n, tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Vi\u1ec7c s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa n\u00e0o c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n tr\u00ean chi\u1ebfc xe n\u00e0y? B. T\u00f4i ch\u01b0a ki\u1ec3m tra xong."}

questions.text_audio:
Who should call to set up my printer?
A. At twelve o'clock.
B. The phone number's on your desk.
C. The weather forecast.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Tôi nên g\u1ecdi cho ai \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1eafp ráp máy in c\u1ee7a mình?<\/p>

A. Lúc 12 gi\u1edd.<\/p>

B. S\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i n\u1eb1m trên bàn b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

C. D\u1ef1 báo th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u00f4i n\u00ean g\u1ecdi cho ai \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1eafp r\u00e1p m\u00e1y in c\u1ee7a m\u00ecnh? B. S\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i n\u1eb1m tr\u00ean b\u00e0n b\u1ea1n."}

questions.text_audio:
Have you ordered more whiteboards for the office yet?
A. Yes, the board of directors.
B. A receipt for the uniforms
C. Cathy's in charge of supplies.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Anh \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t thêm b\u1ea3ng tr\u1eafng cho v\u0103n phòng ch\u01b0a?<\/p>

A. Vâng, h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb.<\/p>

B. Biên lai c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed3ng ph\u1ee5c<\/p>

C. Cathy là ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý v\u1eadt t\u01b0.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh \u0111\u00e3 \u0111\u1eb7t th\u00eam b\u1ea3ng tr\u1eafng cho v\u0103n ph\u00f2ng ch\u01b0a? C. Cathy l\u00e0 ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n l\u00fd v\u1eadt t\u01b0."}

questions.text_audio:
There's a special exhibition at the art gallery.
A. Yes, I read an article about it.
B. She has a high salary.
C. At the next stoplight.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Có m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i tri\u1ec3n lãm \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t \u1edf phòng tr\u01b0ng bày ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt.<\/p>

A. Vâng, tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1ecdc m\u1ed9t bài báo v\u1ec1 nó.<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y có l\u01b0\u01a1ng cao.<\/p>

C. T\u1ea1i \u0111èn giao thông ti\u1ebfp theo.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"C\u00f3 m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i tri\u1ec3n l\u00e3m \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t \u1edf ph\u00f2ng tr\u01b0ng b\u00e0y ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt.  A. V\u00e2ng, t\u00f4i \u0111\u00e3 \u0111\u1ecdc m\u1ed9t b\u00e0i b\u00e1o v\u1ec1 n\u00f3."}

questions.text_audio:
Can I start the videoconference now?
A. No, Let's wait a few minutes.
B. It was very popular.
C. That candidate won.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Tôi có th\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb video \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u01b0a?<\/p>

A. Không, hãy \u0111\u1ee3i vài phút n\u1eefa.<\/p>

B. Nó \u0111ã r\u1ea5t ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn.<\/p>

C. \u1ee8ng c\u1eed viên \u0111ó \u0111ã th\u1eafng.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u00f4i c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb video \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u01b0a?  A. Kh\u00f4ng, h\u00e3y \u0111\u1ee3i v\u00e0i ph\u00fat n\u1eefa."}

questions.text_audio:
Who authorized that purchase?
A. Within an hour or so.
B. Yes, about the budget.
C. Someone in the accounting department.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Ai \u0111ã \u1ee7y quy\u1ec1n cu\u1ed9c giao d\u1ecbch \u0111ó?<\/p>

A. Trong vòng m\u1ed9t gi\u1edd thì ph\u1ea3i.<\/p>

B. Ph\u1ea3i, là v\u1ec1 ngân sách.<\/p>

C. Ai \u0111ó trong phòng k\u1ebf toán.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ai \u0111\u00e3 \u1ee7y quy\u1ec1n cu\u1ed9c giao d\u1ecbch \u0111\u00f3? C. Ai \u0111\u00f3 trong ph\u00f2ng k\u1ebf to\u00e1n."}

questions.text_audio:
Why is the library so busy today?
A. Sure, I have some time.
B. He got a job at a news magazine.
C. Have you seen today's event schedule?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao hôm nay th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n l\u1ea1i \u0111ông \u0111úc th\u1ebf?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi, tôi có m\u1ed9t chút th\u1eddi gian.<\/p>

B. Anh ta có công vi\u1ec7c \u1edf tòa so\u1ea1n m\u1ed9t t\u1ea1p chí tin t\u1ee9c.<\/p>

C. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ea5y l\u1ecbch s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a ngày hôm nay không?<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u1ea1i sao h\u00f4m nay th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n l\u1ea1i \u0111\u00f4ng \u0111\u00fac th\u1ebf? C.B\u1ea1n c\u00f3 th\u1ea5y l\u1ecbch s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a ng\u00e0y h\u00f4m nay kh\u00f4ng?"}

questions.text_audio:
We should really buy a new coffee maker.
A. Cream and sugar, please.
B. That's a good idea.
C. No, put it on my deck.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chúng ta nên mua m\u1ed9t cái máy pha cà phê m\u1edbi.<\/p>

A. Làm \u01a1n l\u1ea5y kem v\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng nhé.<\/p>

B. Ý hay \u0111\u1ea5y.<\/p>

C. Không, hãy \u0111\u1eb7t nó lên boong tàu.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ch\u00fang ta n\u00ean mua m\u1ed9t c\u00e1i m\u00e1y pha c\u00e0 ph\u00ea m\u1edbi. B. \u00dd hay \u0111\u1ea5y."}

questions.text_audio:
I'm afraid I won't be able to lead the tour this afternoon.
A. OK, thanks for letting me know.
B. I left it for you by the elevator.
C. No, maybe just a quick update.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Tôi e là chi\u1ec1u nay tôi s\u1ebd không th\u1ec3 d\u1eabn chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i này \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.<\/p>

A. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã cho tôi bi\u1ebft.<\/p>

B. Tôi \u0111\u1ec3 nó g\u1ea7n thang máy cho anh \u0111\u1ea5y.<\/p>

C. Không, ch\u1ec9 là c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt nhanh thôi.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u00f4i e l\u00e0 chi\u1ec1u nay t\u00f4i s\u1ebd kh\u00f4ng th\u1ec3 d\u1eabn chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i n\u00e0y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c. A. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n v\u00ec \u0111\u00e3 cho t\u00f4i bi\u1ebft."}

questions.text_audio:
We still need to sign our contract with the advertising agency, don't we?
A. My travel agent found me great hotel
B. Yes, by next Friday.
C. I saw that commercial as well.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chúng ta v\u1eabn c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i ký h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng v\u1edbi công ty qu\u1ea3ng cáo mà ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n du l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ã tìm cho tôi m\u1ed9t khách s\u1ea1n tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi<\/p>

B. Ph\u1ea3i, vào th\u1ee9 sáu t\u1edbi.<\/p>

C. Tôi c\u0169ng th\u1ea5y qu\u1ea3ng cáo \u0111ó.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ch\u00fang ta v\u1eabn c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i k\u00fd h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng v\u1edbi c\u00f4ng ty qu\u1ea3ng c\u00e1o m\u00e0 ph\u1ea3i kh\u00f4ng? B. Ph\u1ea3i, v\u00e0o th\u1ee9 s\u00e1u t\u1edbi."}

questions.text_audio:
Should bring some photography samples to the job interview?
A. Please sign your name here.
B. I've seen them online.
C. What a nice view.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Có nên mang vài m\u1eabu \u1ea3nh \u0111\u1ebfn bu\u1ed5i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n không?<\/p>

A. Xin hãy ký tên vào \u0111ây.<\/p>

B. Tôi \u0111ã th\u1ea5y nó trên m\u1ea1ng r\u1ed3i.<\/p>

C. C\u1ea3nh nhìn \u0111\u1eb9p quá.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"C\u00f3 n\u00ean mang v\u00e0i m\u1eabu \u1ea3nh \u0111\u1ebfn bu\u1ed5i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n kh\u00f4ng? B. T\u00f4i \u0111\u00e3 th\u1ea5y n\u00f3 tr\u00ean m\u1ea1ng r\u1ed3i."}

questions.text_audio:
Is there a room in the store where I can try this shirt on?
A. You can follow me.
B. We'll try harder next time.
C. She's not here right now.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

C\u00f3 ph\u00f2ng n\u00e0o trong c\u1eeda h\u00e0ng n\u01a1i t\u00f4i c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 th\u1eed c\u00e1i \u00e1o n\u00e0y kh\u00f4ng?<\/p>

A. B\u1ea1n c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 \u0111i theo t\u00f4i.<\/p>

B. Ch\u00fang ta s\u1ebd c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng h\u01a1n l\u1ea7n sau.<\/p>

C. C\u00f4 \u1ea5y hi\u1ec7n kh\u00f4ng c\u00f3 \u1edf \u0111\u00e2y.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"C\u00f3 ph\u00f2ng n\u00e0o trong c\u1eeda h\u00e0ng n\u01a1i t\u00f4i c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 th\u1eed c\u00e1i \u00e1o n\u00e0y kh\u00f4ng? A. B\u1ea1n c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 \u0111i theo t\u00f4i.","en":"You can follow me."}

questions.text_audio:
Would you like to meet on Tuesday or Wednesday?
A. Actually, he did like it.
B. The staffing policy.
C. I don't have my appointment book with me.

{"vn":"

Anh mu\u1ed1n g\u1eb7p nhau vào th\u1ee9 ba hay th\u1ee9 t\u01b0?<\/p>

A. Th\u1ef1c ra thì anh ta có thích nó.<\/p>

B. Chính sách nhân s\u1ef1.<\/p>

C. Tôi không mang s\u1ed5 l\u1ecbch h\u1eb9n c\u1ee7a mình trong ng\u01b0\u1eddi.<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh mu\u1ed1n g\u1eb7p nhau v\u00e0o th\u1ee9 ba hay th\u1ee9 t\u01b0? C. T\u00f4i kh\u00f4ng mang s\u1ed5 l\u1ecbch h\u1eb9n c\u1ee7a m\u00ecnh trong ng\u01b0\u1eddi."}

parts.name: Short conversations
parts.title: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Good morning, and (32) thank you for calling the Bridge City Hotel. How may I help you?

M-Au: Hello. (33) I just saw an advertisement for a receptionist position at your hotel. If the job still available, I’d like to apply for it.

W-Br: (34) Let me go and ask Elena Smith. She’s our hiring manager, so she’d know if the position has been filled yet.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào bu\u1ed5i sáng, và (32) c\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã g\u1ecdi cho Khách s\u1ea1n Bridge City. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho b\u1ea1n?<\/p>

M-Au: Xin chào. (33) Tôi v\u1eeba th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t qu\u1ea3ng cáo cho v\u1ecb trí ti\u1ebfp tân t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n c\u1ee7a cô. N\u1ebfu công vi\u1ec7c v\u1eabn còn, tôi mu\u1ed1n xin \u1ee9ng tuy\u1ec3n.<\/p>

W-Br: (34) \u0110\u1ec3 tôi \u0111i h\u1ecfi Elena Smith. Cô \u1ea5y là ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý nhân s\u1ef1 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, nên cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd bi\u1ebft v\u1ecb trí \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn hay ch\u01b0a.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Robert, (35) is everything ready for this morning’s training on the new accounting software? We should gel started soon.

M-Cn: Actually, (36) I just noticed a mistake in the training handout. Some of the information is out of order.

W-Am: Yes, you’re right. Sorry I didn’t mention it earlier. That’s already been fixed, and there’s a new version. I’ll go down the hall and print out some new copies. While I do that, (37) can you set up the projector in the training room?

M-Cn: Yeah, I’ll go make sure all the equipment is ready.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Robert, (35) m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng cho bu\u1ed5i hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n sáng nay v\u1ec1 ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m k\u1ebf toán m\u1edbi ch\u01b0a? Chúng ta nên b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u s\u1edbm thôi.<\/p>

M-Cn: Th\u1ef1c ra thì (36) tôi v\u1eeba nh\u1eadn th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t sai sót trong bài t\u1eadp hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n. Có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 thông tin r\u1ea5t l\u1ed9n x\u1ed9n.<\/p>

W-Am: Ph\u1ea3i, anh nói \u0111úng. Xin l\u1ed7i vì \u0111ã không nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn chuy\u1ec7n này s\u1edbm h\u01a1n. Nh\u1eefng thông tin \u0111ó \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eeda l\u1ea1i, và có m\u1ed9t phiên b\u1ea3n m\u1edbi. Tôi s\u1ebd xu\u1ed1ng hành lang và in vài b\u1ea3n sao m\u1edbi. Trong khi tôi làm \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó, anh có th\u1ec3 thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp máy chi\u1ebfu trong phòng hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eb5n sàng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Hi, (38)I’m calling from Brookshire Theater for Ms. Ito.

W-Br: This is she.

M-Au: I understand you have tickets to tonight’s dance performance. (39) I’m sorry, but we’ve had to cancel tonight’s show.

W-Br: That’s too bad. Tonight was the only night I could make it

M-Au: I’m sorry about that. I can offer you a refund for the ticket.

W-Br:Oh, I’ll take the refund, Thanks.

M-Au: Sure. And (40) I’ll also e-mail you a promotional code that’ll give you a discount on your next ticket purchase.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Xin chào, (38) tôi g\u1ecdi t\u1eeb Nhà hát Brookshire mu\u1ed1n g\u1eb7p cô Ito.<\/p>

W-Br: Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ây.<\/p>

M-Au: Tôi hi\u1ec3u là cô có vé \u0111\u1ebfn bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n khiêu v\u0169 t\u1ed1i nay. (39) Tôi xin l\u1ed7i, nh\u01b0ng chúng tôi \u0111ã ph\u1ea3i h\u1ee7y bu\u1ed5i di\u1ec5n t\u1ed1i này.<\/p>

W-Br: T\u1ec7 th\u1eadt. T\u1ed1i nay là \u0111êm duy nh\u1ea5t tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c<\/p>

M-Au: Tôi xin l\u1ed7i v\u1ec1 chuy\u1ec7n \u0111ó. Tôi có th\u1ec3 hoàn ti\u1ec1n vé cho cô.<\/p>

W-Br: Ô, tôi s\u1ebd l\u1ea5y ti\u1ec1n hoàn l\u1ea1i v\u1eady. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n.<\/p>

M-Au: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. Và (40) tôi c\u0169ng g\u1eedi e-mail cho cô m\u1ed9t mã khuy\u1ebfn mãi và nó s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3m giá vé ti\u1ebfp theo c\u1ee7a cô.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Hi, Ricardo. Thanks for meeting with me. Since (41)we’re in charge of planning this year’s summer outing for the staff, we’d better get started. It’s only a few months away!

M-Cn: Right. But (42) we could just follow the plans from previous years. Everyone had a lot of fun on those hikes in the mountains.

W-Am: That’s true, but, we’ve done that for three years in a row.

M-Cn: I see what you mean. So what were you thinking?

W.Am Well, (43)we could all take a cooking class together at the culinary school.

M-Cn Hmm, I like that idea. (43)But aren’t those classes expensive? Our budget isn’t very big.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào, Ricardo. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã g\u1eb7p tôi. Vì (41) chúng ta ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch cho chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i mùa hè n\u0103m nay cho nhân viên, t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n là ta nên b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u. Ch\u1ec9 còn cách vài tháng n\u1eefa thôi!<\/p>

M-Cn: Ph\u1ea3i. Nh\u01b0ng (42) chúng ta c\u0169ng có th\u1ec3 làm theo k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch t\u1eeb nh\u1eefng n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc. M\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã r\u1ea5t vui v\u1ebb trong nh\u1eefng chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i trên núi.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110úng v\u1eady, nh\u01b0ng chúng ta \u0111ã làm \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó 3 n\u0103m liên ti\u1ebfp r\u1ed3i.<\/p>

M-Cn: Tôi hi\u1ec3u ý cô. V\u1eady cô \u0111ã ngh\u0129 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gì r\u1ed3i?<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110\u1ec3 xem, (43) chúng ta có th\u1ec3 cùng h\u1ecdc n\u1ea5u \u0103n \u1edf tr\u01b0\u1eddng d\u1ea1y n\u1ea5u \u0103n.<\/p>

M-Cn: \u1eeam, tôi thích ý t\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111ó. (43) Nh\u01b0ng không ph\u1ea3i nh\u1eefng l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc \u0111ó \u0111\u1eaft ti\u1ec1n l\u1eafm sao? Ngân sách c\u1ee7a chúng ta c\u0169ng không l\u1edbn l\u1eafm.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the woman mean when she says, “we’ve done that for three years in a row”?
childrens.answers: ["She does not have much experience with a task.","She thinks an activity has been popular.","She does not want to repeat an activity.","She does not need directions to a location."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef có ý gì khi cô \u1ea5y nói, \"Chúng ta \u0111ã làm \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó trong ba n\u0103m liên ti\u1ebfp r\u1ed3i\"?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y không có nhi\u1ec1u kinh nghi\u1ec7m \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t công vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y ngh\u0129 m\u1ed9t ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111ã tr\u1edf nên r\u1ea5t ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn.<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y không mu\u1ed1n l\u1eb7p l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng.<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y không c\u1ea7n ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên thông tin: \"Right. But we could just follow the plans from previous years. Everyone had a lot of fun on those hikes in the mountains.\", ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef này không mu\u1ed1n lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch \u0111i b\u1ed9 lên núi n\u0103m nay khi ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng này \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1eb7p l\u1ea1i ba l\u1ea7n r\u1ed3i. do \u0111ó (C) là câu \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

What does the woman mean when she says, “we’ve done that for three years in a row”?<\/p>

A. She does not have much experience with a task.<\/p>

B. She thinks an activity has been popular.<\/p>

C. She does not want to repeat an activity.<\/p>

D. She does not need directions to a location.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the information: \"Right. But we could just follow the plans from previous years. Everyone had a lot of fun on those hikes in the mountains.\", the woman does not want to plan a mountain hike this year as this activity has been repeated three times already hence (C) is correct.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br :Thanks for being flexible in meeting with us. (44) Things have been so hectic with recording the songs for our new album and preparing for our tour.
M-Au: Not a problem. I understand completely.
W-Am: Great! OK, so we love the imagery you’ve created for other bands, and (44) we’d like to have a new T-shirt design to sell during our concerts.
M-Au: Thanks! I appreciate the business, and I’m looking forward to this.
W-Br: Oh—and (45) can you make sure the design would fit on stickers and tote bags, too?
M-Au: Definitely. Now, before designing anything, (46) have new clients complete a questionnaire to give me a sense of their style. After I get your questionnaire, I can start drawing.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã dành th\u1eddi gian g\u1eb7p chúng tôi. (44) M\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 \u0111ã r\u1ea5t b\u1eadn r\u1ed9n v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c ghi âm các bài hát cho album m\u1edbi và vi\u1ec7c chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i l\u01b0u di\u1ec5n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi n\u1eefa.
M-Au: Không thành v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1. Tôi hoàn toàn hi\u1ec3u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.
W-Am: Tuy\u1ec7t ! \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, chúng tôi r\u1ea5t thích hình \u1ea3nh mà anh \u0111ã t\u1ea1o ra cho các ban nh\u1ea1c khác, và (44) chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n có m\u1ed9t m\u1eabu thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf áo thun m\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 bán trong các bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c.
M-Au: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n! Tôi c\u1ea3m kích v\u1edbi công vi\u1ec7c kinh doanh, và tôi r\u1ea5t mong ch\u1edd \u0111i\u1ec1u này.
W-Br: Ô — và (45) anh có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf s\u1ebd phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi nhãn dán và túi xách không?
M-Au: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. Bây gi\u1edd, tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 th\u1ee9 gì, (46) có khách hàng làm m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3ng th\u0103m dò s\u1ebd cho tôi hi\u1ec3u v\u1ec1 phong cách c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd . Sau khi tôi nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3ng câu h\u1ecfi thì tôi có th\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u v\u1ebd.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hi, this is Hitoshi at the Shower Barn. How can help you?
W-Am: (47) I’m calling because I saw an online ad about your company’s new showerheads. I own an apartment complex, and the showers have really old fixtures.
M-Cu: Yes, of course. As the advertisement points out, (48)our new model controls water flow much more efficiently. It decreases water usage by an average of twenty percent.
W-Am: That sounds great.(49)Could I get a price estimate for the installation of 30 of those showerheads?
W-Cn: Absolutely. Please hold for a moment.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Xin chào, \u0111ây là Hitoshi c\u1ee7a Shower Barn. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho b\u1ea1n?
W-Am: (47) Tôi g\u1ecdi vì tôi \u0111ã th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t qu\u1ea3ng cáo tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn v\u1ec1 hoa sen vòi t\u1eafm m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a công ty anh. Tôi s\u1edf h\u1eefu m\u1ed9t khu chung c\u01b0, và nh\u1eefng cái vòi sen có gá treo r\u1ea5t c\u0169.
M-Cu: Vâng, d\u0129 nhiên. Nh\u01b0 qu\u1ea3ng cáo ch\u1ec9 ra, (48) m\u1eabu mã m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a chúng tôi ki\u1ec3m soát lu\u1ed3ng n\u01b0\u1edbc hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 h\u01a1n. Nó gi\u1ea3m m\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ed9 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng n\u01b0\u1edbc trung bình 20%.
W-Am: Nghe có v\u1ebb hay \u0111\u1ea5y (49). Tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft giá \u01b0\u1edbc tính cho vi\u1ec7c l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t 30 hoa sen vòi t\u1ea5m không?
W-Cn: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. Xin vui lòng ch\u1edd m\u1ed9t chút.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: How did the woman learn about a company’s products?
childrens.answers: ["She saw an advertisement.","She heard about them from a neighbor.","She is a regular customer.","She lives near the store."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Sao ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef bi\u1ebft \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a công ty?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t qu\u1ea3ng cáo.<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y nghe v\u1ec1 chúng t\u1eeb hàng xóm.<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y là khách hàng th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên.<\/p>

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: (50) I'm Dan Cooper with Summitville TV, your local news station, broadcasting from the brand new Summitville Public Libraty. After two long, years of construction, local resident are excited about the library's opening. Les't speck with someone now. Excuse me, ma'am, do you live in the neighborhood?

W-Br: Hi, yes, and I'm just so glad to have a library right down the block. (51) It was inconvenient having to take the bus across town to visit the old one. Now I can check out books any time I want.

M-Au: Yes, and it'll be especially easy for members, since I understand (52) the library has started a digital books initiative which allows members to borrow electronic books online.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: (50) Tôi là Dan Cooper c\u1ee7a \u0110ài truy\u1ec1n hình Summitville, \u0111ài tin t\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, phát sóng t\u1eeb Th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n Summitville hoàn toàn m\u1edbi. Sau hai n\u0103m dài xây d\u1ef1ng, c\u01b0 dân \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng r\u1ea5t hào h\u1ee9ng v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n m\u1edf c\u1eeda. Gi\u1edd hãy nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t ai \u0111ó nào. Xin l\u1ed7i, th\u01b0a bà, bà có s\u1ed1ng \u1edf khu ph\u1ed1 này không?<\/p>

W-Br: Xin chào, vâng, và tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi có m\u1ed9t th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n ngay \u0111ây. (51) Th\u1eadt b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n khi ph\u1ea3i \u0111i xe buýt ngang qua th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec3 th\u0103m th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n c\u0169. Gi\u1edd tôi có th\u1ec3 xem sách b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 lúc nào tôi mu\u1ed1n.<\/p>

M-Au: Vâng, và nó s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t d\u1ec5 dàng cho nh\u1eefng thành viên th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n, vì theo tôi hi\u1ec3u thì (52) th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n \u0111ã kh\u1edfi x\u01b0\u1edbng k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch sách \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed cho phép các thành viên m\u01b0\u1ee3n sách \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn:(53)I’d like to return this phone charging cable, but I can’t find my receipt.

W-Am: May I ask why you’re returning it?

M-Cn: It doesn’t work—it won’t charge my mobile phone.

W-Am:(54)I’m a new salesperson, and I haven’t learned yet how to refund an item without a receipt… Oh, but (55)here comes my manager she’ll be able to do It.

W-Br: Hi, Tina, Is there something you need help with?

W-Am: Yes, this customer wants to return a defective product but he doesn't have a receipt.

W-Br: Okay, I can process the return, sir. I just need to see the original credit card you used to purchase the item.

M-Cn: Thanks. Here is it.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn:(53) Tôi mu\u1ed1n tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i dây s\u1ea1c \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i này, nh\u01b0ng tôi không th\u1ec3 tìm th\u1ea5y biên lai c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi có th\u1ec3 h\u1ecfi t\u1ea1i sao anh l\u1ea1i tr\u1ea3 nó không?<\/p>

M-Cn: Nó không ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng - tôi không th\u1ec3 s\u1ea1c \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.<\/p>

W-Am:(54) Tôi là ng\u01b0\u1eddi bán hàng m\u1edbi, và tôi v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a h\u1ecdc \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cách hoàn ti\u1ec1n cho m\u1ed9t món \u0111\u1ed3 mà không có biên lai…, \u1ed2, (55) ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ây, cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd làm \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó.<\/p>

W-Br: Xin chào Tina, cô có c\u1ea7n giúp gì không?
W-Am: Vâng, khách hàng này mu\u1ed1n tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t món hàng b\u1ecb h\u1ecfng nh\u01b0ng anh ta không có biên lai.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, th\u01b0a anh, tôi có th\u1ec3 x\u1eed lý món hàng tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i. Tôi ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n xem th\u1ebb tín d\u1ee5ng mà anh \u0111ã s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 mua hàng.<\/p>

M-Cn: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n. Nó \u0111ây.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi, Dean. (56) I just reviewed the updates you made to the company Website. The new layout looks great.
M-Cn: That’s good to hear. Do you think it’s ready to launch then?
W-Br: Almost. I noticed that (57) some of the photographs of our colleagues are a little outdated. Could you replace them with more current ones?
M-Cn: Sure, that’s not a problem. (58) I’ll e-mail all of the employees to ask them for more recent photos that I can use.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào Dean. (56) Tôi v\u1eeba xem l\u1ea1i b\u1ea3n c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt mà anh \u0111ã làm cho trang web công ty. B\u1ed1 c\u1ee5c m\u1edbi trông tuy\u1ec7t l\u1eafm.
M-Bn: Th\u1eadt t\u1ed1t khi nghe \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. Cô có ngh\u0129 nó \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tung ra không?
W-Br: G\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c. Tôi nh\u1eadn th\u1ea5y r\u1eb1ng (57) m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 b\u1ee9c \u1ea3nh \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a chúng ta có h\u01a1i l\u1ed7i th\u1eddi. Anh có th\u1ec3 thay th\u1ebf chúng v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng b\u1ee9c m\u1edbi h\u01a1n không?
M-Cn: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i, \u0111ó không ph\u1ea3i là v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1. (58) Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eedi e-mail cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các nhân viên xin h\u1ecd thêm nh\u1eefng b\u1ee9c \u1ea3nh g\u1ea7n \u0111ây mà tôi có th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Hi, Fernando, I'm so frustrated with this project. Do you have time to talk?

M-Au: Sure, Inès. What's wrong?

W-Am: Well, I've been working on the Marius Cosmetics account. Whenever I send them an advertisement that they've approved, they want to revise it again. It's happened several times this week. You wouldn't believe it.

M-Au: Actually, Marius Cosmetics was my first account here. And it doesn't sound like they've changed much.

W-Am: Really? I'm relieved to hear that.

M-Au: Some clients have trouble sticking with a decision...Here's my suggestion. Ask your manager to give them a call. That could help with the problem.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào Fernando. Tôi r\u1ea5t th\u1ea5t v\u1ecdng v\u1edbi d\u1ef1 án này. Anh có th\u1eddi gian nói chuy\u1ec7n không?<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi, Inès. Có chuy\u1ec7n gì v\u1eady?<\/p>

W-Am: À thì, tôi \u0111ang làm cho tài kho\u1ea3n c\u1ee7a Hãng M\u1ef9 ph\u1ea9m Marius. B\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 khi nào tôi g\u1eedi cho h\u1ecd m\u1ed9t qu\u1ea3ng cáo mà h\u1ecd \u0111ã ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn, h\u1ecd l\u1ea1i mu\u1ed1n s\u1eeda l\u1ea1i nó. Nó x\u1ea3y ra vài l\u1ea7n trong tu\u1ea7n này r\u1ed3i. Anh s\u1ebd không th\u1ec3 tin \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111âu.<\/p>

M-Au: Th\u1ef1c ra thì Hãng M\u1ef9 ph\u1ea9m Marius là tài kho\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a tôi \u1edf \u0111ây. Và nghe có v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 h\u1ecd ch\u1eb3ng thay \u0111\u1ed5i gì nhi\u1ec1u.<\/p>

W-Am: Th\u1eadt sao? Th\u1eadt nh\u1eb9 nhõm khi nghe th\u1ea5y \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó.<\/p>

M-Au: M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 khách hàng g\u1eb7p r\u1eafc r\u1ed1i khi \u0111\u01b0a ra quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh...\u0110ây là g\u1ee3i ý c\u1ee7a tôi. Yêu c\u1ea7u qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a cô g\u1ecdi cho h\u1ecd. Nó có th\u1ec3 giúp gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này \u0111\u1ea5y.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why does the man say, “Marius Cosmetics was my first account here”?
childrens.answers: ["To show that he understands a problem","To explain that he no longer works with a client","To complain about a coworker's mistake","To request a promotion"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông nói, \"Hãng M\u1ef9 ph\u1ea9m Marius là tài kho\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a tôi \u1edf \u0111ây\"?<\/p>

A. Th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n r\u1eb1ng anh ta hi\u1ec3u m\u1ed9t v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1<\/p>

B. Gi\u1ea3i thích r\u1eb1ng anh ta không còn làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t khách hàng n\u1eefa<\/p>

C. Khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t sai sót c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>

D. Yêu c\u1ea7u th\u0103ng ch\u1ee9c<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên thông tin: \"Well, I've been working on the Marius Cosmetics account. Whenever I send them an advertisement that they've approved, they want to revise it again. It's happened several times this week. You wouldn't believe it.\", \u0111i\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông nói ám ch\u1ec9 r\u1eb1ng anh ta \u0111ã t\u1eebng làm vi\u1ec7c cho hãng này nên anh ta hi\u1ec3u v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef. (A) là câu \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Why does the man say, “Marius Cosmetics was my first account here”?<\/p>

A. To show that he understands a problem<\/p>

B. To explain that he no longer works with a client<\/p>

C. To complain about a coworker's mistake<\/p>

D. To request a promotion<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the information: \"Well, I've been working on the Marius Cosmetics account. Whenever I send them an advertisement that they've approved, they want to revise it again. It's happened several times this week. You wouldn't believe it.\", what the man says indicates he worked for them before so he understands the woman's problem. (A) is correct.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cr: (62) Today’s medical seminar has been 64 really good so far. I’m looking forward to the rest of it.
W-Br: Me too. (62),(63) This afternoon’s workshop on ethics in medicine should be very interesting. A colleague of mine is leading it.
M-Cn: The workshop starts in an hour, so we’d better get lunch now if we want to get back in time.
W-Br: Well, I found some dining options for the area in this guidebook. Korean food is my favorite, but I think Main Street is a bit far from here.
M-Cn: Hmm… we’re on Lord Street now.
W-Br: Oh, (64) the guidebook lists a restaurant on Lord Street, it should be on this block. (64) Let’s eat there.
М-Са OK.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cr: (62) Bu\u1ed5i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o y khoa hôm nay (60) r\u1ea5t hay. Tôi \u0111ang mong ch\u1edd ph\u1ea7n còn l\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a nó. W - br: Tôi c\u0169ng v\u1eady. (62),(63) H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o chi\u1ec1u nay v\u1ec1 \u0111\u1ea1o \u0111\u1ee9c trong y h\u1ecdc s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t thú v\u1ecb \u0111ây. M\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ang ch\u1ee7 trì nó. M-Cn: H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u trong m\u1ed9t gi\u1edd, v\u1eady chúng ta t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t nên \u0111i \u0103n tr\u01b0a n\u1ebfu ta mu\u1ed1n quay l\u1ea1i k\u1ecbp gi\u1edd. W-Br: Tôi tìm th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u0103n u\u1ed1ng c\u1ee7a khu v\u1ef1c trong sách h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn này. Món \u0103n Hàn Qu\u1ed1c là món \u01b0a thích c\u1ee7a tôi, nh\u01b0ng tôi ngh\u0129 Ph\u1ed1 Chính cách \u0111ây h\u01a1i xa. M-Cn: \u1eeam... chúng ta \u0111ang \u1edf trên Ph\u1ed1 Lord. W - br: Ô, (64) cu\u1ed1n sách h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn li\u1ec7t kê m\u1ed9t nhà hàng trên Ph\u1ed1 Lord, nó \u1edf g\u1ea7n \u0111ây thôi. Hãy \u0103n \u1edf \u0111ó nhé. \u041c-\u0421\u0430: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Ms. Parker, would you still like me to book a flight for you to Hawaii?

W-Am: Yes, I would. The new branch office there is finally opening, and I want to be there for the first week to make sure everything goes smoothly.

M-Au: OK. When do you want to leave?

W-Am: Are there any flights on June fifteenth?

M-Au: Let me check online now. Hmm, all flights on that day are sold out. But there's one flight with availability on June fourteenth.

W-Am: That date will work for me. I'd prefer a window seat, if there is one.

M-Au: There's just one seat available by a window. I'll book that for you now.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Cô Parker, cô v\u1eabn mu\u1ed1n tôi \u0111\u1eb7t vé cho cô \u0111\u1ebfn Hawaii ch\u1ee9?<\/p>

W-Am: Vâng, tôi mu\u1ed1n v\u1eady. V\u0103n phòng chi nhánh m\u1edbi cu\u1ed1i cùng c\u0169ng m\u1edf c\u1eeda, và tôi mu\u1ed1n \u1edf \u0111ó vào tu\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 di\u1ec5n ra suôn s\u1ebb.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i. Cô mu\u1ed1n \u0111i khi nào?<\/p>

W-Am: Có chuy\u1ebfn bay nào vào ngày 15 tháng 6 không?<\/p>

M-Au: Bây gi\u1edd \u0111\u1ec3 tôi ki\u1ec3m tra trên m\u1ea1ng. \u1eeam, t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các chuy\u1ebfn bay vào ngày \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec1u h\u1ebft vé. Nh\u01b0ng có m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ebfn bay có s\u1eb5n vào ngày 14 tháng 6.<\/p>

W-Am: Ngày \u0111ó tôi \u0111i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c. Tôi mu\u1ed1n gh\u1ebf c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 n\u1ebfu có.<\/p>

M-Au: Ch\u1ec9 có m\u1ed9t ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea1nh c\u1eeda s\u1ed5. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eb7t nó cho cô ngay.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi, this is Emiko from ShipHub International. I received your application to be one of our specialty drivers. You have a lot of experience.

M-Cn: Yes, I drove a delivery truck for several years.

W-Br: Great. I'd like to set up an interview this week. I see that you indicated you're free on Friday morning, but there are no open interview times that morning. Could you come in tomorrow at nine A.M.?

M-Cn: Sure, I can meet you tomorrow at nine.

W-Br: OK. Now, I already have your application, but please bring the names of references you'd like to use - maybe a few of your previous managers and their phone numbers.

M-Cn: OK, I'll bring a list tomorrow. Thanks.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào, \u0111ây là Emiko t\u1eeb Shiphub International. Tôi nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u01a1n xin \u1ee9ng tuy\u1ec3n c\u1ee7a anh \u0111\u1ec3 tr\u1edf thành m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng tài x\u1ebf chuyên môn c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Anh có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u kinh nghi\u1ec7m.<\/p>

M-Cn: Vâng, tôi \u0111ã lái xe t\u1ea3i giao hàng trong vài n\u0103m nay.<\/p>

W-Br: T\u1ed1t. Tôi mu\u1ed1n ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n trong tu\u1ea7n này. Tôi th\u1ea5y anh có ch\u1ec9 r\u1eb1ng anh r\u1ea3nh vào sáng th\u1ee9 sáu, nh\u01b0ng không có \u0111\u1ee7 th\u1eddi gian cho bu\u1ed5i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n nào sáng hôm \u0111ó. Anh có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn vào ngày mai lúc 9 gi\u1edd sáng không?<\/p>

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi, tôi có th\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p cô vào 9 gi\u1edd sáng mai.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c. Bây gi\u1edd, tôi \u0111ã có \u0111\u01a1n \u1ee9ng tuy\u1ec3n c\u1ee7a anh, nh\u01b0ng hãy vui lòng mang tên c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u mà anh mu\u1ed1n dùng - có th\u1ec3 là m\u1ed9t vài ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý tr\u01b0\u1edbc và s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd.<\/p>

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, tôi s\u1ebd mang m\u1ed9t danh sách vào ngày mai. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n.<\/p>"}

childrens.explains:

Nhìn b\u1ea3ng kia. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n vào ngày nào?<\/p>

A. Vào th\u1ee9 ba<\/p>

B. Vào th\u1ee9 t\u01b0<\/p>

C. Vào th\u1ee9 n\u0103m<\/p>

D. Vào th\u1ee9 sáu<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên thông tin: \"Great. I'd like to set up an interview this week. I see that you indicated you're free on Friday morning, but there are no open interview times that morning. Could you come in tomorrow at nine A.M.?\" và \"Sure, I can meet you tomorrow at nine.\", b\u1ea3ng bi\u1ec3u cho th\u1ea5y th\u1ee9 ba vào lúc 9 gi\u1edd sáng nên (A) là câu \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Look at the graphic. Which day will the man be interviewed?<\/p>

A. On Tuesday<\/p>

B. On Wednesday<\/p>

C. On Thursday<\/p>

D. On Friday<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the information: \"Great. I'd like to set up an interview this week. I see that you indicated you're free on Friday morning, but there are no open interview times that morning. Could you come in tomorrow at nine A.M.?\" and \"Sure, I can meet you tomorrow at nine.\", the graphic shows Tuesday at 9 A.M. so (A) is correct.<\/p>"}

B. Ch\u1ee9ng ch\u1ec9 chuyên môn<\/p>

C. \u1ea2nh c\u0103n c\u01b0\u1edbc<\/p>

D. \u0110\u01a1n \u1ee9ng tuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c in ra<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

OK. Now, I already have your application, but please bring the names of references you'd like to use - maybe a few of your previous managers and their phone numbers.<\/p>","en":"

parts.name: Short talks
parts.title: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio: (71) The next item on our agenda is the upcoming visit to our company by colleagues from our branch office in Germany. They’re coming to get trained on the new software we recently purchased. They’ll be participating in this training with all of our staff here. While they’re here, (72) they’re also interested in touring the city. We’re looking for volunteers to show them around. (73) lf you’re interested in helping with this, please send me an e-mail after today’s meeting. Be sure to include your availability so that we can schedule the tours.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

(71) M\u1ee5c ti\u1ebfp theo trong ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ngh\u1ecb s\u1ef1 c\u1ee7a chúng ta là chuy\u1ebfn vi\u1ebfng th\u0103m s\u1eafp t\u1edbi c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p t\u1eeb v\u0103n phòng chi nhánh \u1edf \u0110\u1ee9c. H\u1ecd \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n v\u1ec1 ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m m\u1edbi mà chúng ta \u0111ã mua g\u1ea7n \u0111ây. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd tham gia \u0111ào t\u1ea1o v\u1edbi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên t\u1ea1i \u0111ây. Trong khi h\u1ecd \u1edf \u0111ây, (72) h\u1ecd c\u0169ng có h\u1ee9ng thú v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c tham quan thành ph\u1ed1. Chúng tôi \u0111ang tìm ng\u01b0\u1eddi tình nguy\u1ec7n \u0111\u01b0a h\u1ecd \u0111i quan sát xung quanh. (73) N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n h\u1ee9ng thú \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c giúp \u0111\u1ee1, hãy g\u1eedi cho tôi email sau bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdp hôm nay. Hãy \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o là ph\u1ea3i bao g\u1ed3m kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng có m\u1eb7t c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 lên l\u1ecbch tham quan.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Ladies and gentlemen, may I please have your attention? (74) This is an announcement for passengers of flight seven-ten to Tokyo. (75) Your aircraft will now be departing from gate A2, rather than from gate A7. We apologize for the inconvenience of this last-minute change. (76) When we start boarding, please have your photo identification card out and ready to be checked. Thank you.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Th\u01b0a quý ông và quý bà, có th\u1ec1 cho tôi xin s\u1ef1 chú ý c\u1ee7a m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không? (74) \u0110ây là thông báo dành cho hành khách c\u1ee7a chuy\u1ebfn bay 7-10 \u0111\u1ebfn Tokyo. (75) Máy bay c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd kh\u1edfi hành t\u1eeb c\u1ed5ng A2, thay vì c\u1ed5ng A7. Chúng tôi xin l\u1ed7i vì s\u1ef1 b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a thay \u0111\u1ed5i phút chót này. (76) Khi chúng ta b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u lên máy bay, vui lòng mang \u1ea3nh th\u1ebb c\u0103n c\u01b0\u1edbc c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n ra và s\u1eb5n sàng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ki\u1ec3m tra. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Br: And now for the hourly traffic report. Highway 95 is currently experiencing heavy traffic because of the concert that's taking place at the convention center this evening. To find alternate routes, we recommend taking a look at the interactive map on our Web site. Also, remember that construction will begin in the downtown area early next week, and sections of Market Street will likely be closed. We'll be sure to let you know as soon as the construction project is complete. Thanks for listening, and enjoy your drive.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Và gi\u1edd là b\u1ea3n tin giao thông theo gi\u1edd. \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng cao t\u1ed1c 95 \u0111ang ùm t\u1eafc giao thông n\u1eb7ng n\u1ec1 vì bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c di\u1ec5n ra t\u1ea1i trung tâm h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb t\u1ed1i nay. \u0110\u1ec3 tìm các tuy\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng thay th\u1ebf, b\u1ea1n nên xem b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3 t\u01b0\u01a1ng tác trên trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Còn n\u1eefa, hãy nh\u1edb r\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1ea1i khu v\u1ef1c trung tâm vào \u0111\u1ea7u tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi, và các ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee7a Ph\u1ed1 Ch\u1ee3 s\u1ebd b\u1ecb \u0111óng c\u1eeda. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd cho b\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft ngay khi d\u1ef1 án xây d\u1ef1ng hoàn thành. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n \u0111ã l\u1eafng nghe, và chúc b\u1ea1n t\u1eadn h\u01b0\u1edfng chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Cn: Welcome aboard and thanks again for joining our lake tour. It's going to be a beautiful day on the water. On this trip, you'll learn about the people who lived on Harmon Island many years ago, and you'll view their historic homes. Seeing these structures will give you an idea of how different life was back then... Now, I'm sure you all brought your cameras. The first time we pass by the island we'll facing the sun, so you won't have any luck taking photos. That's OK, though. We'll be coming back the opposite way on the return trip. All right, let's get going!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào m\u1eebng lên tàu và c\u1ea3m \u01a1n l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa vì \u0111ã tham gia tour du l\u1ecbch h\u1ed3 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. \u0110ây s\u1ebd là m\u1ed9t ngày \u0111\u1eb9p tr\u1eddi trên m\u1eb7t n\u01b0\u1edbc. Trong chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i này, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd h\u1ecdc \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1ed1ng \u1edf \u0111\u1ea3o Harmon cách \u0111ây nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc, và b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y nh\u1eefng ngôi nhà mang tính l\u1ecbch s\u1eed c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. Nhìn th\u1ea5y nh\u1eefng ki\u1ebfn trúc này s\u1ebd giúp b\u1ea1n hình dung \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng h\u1ed3i \u0111ó khác bi\u1ec7t nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào. Bây gi\u1edd, tôi ch\u1eafc là t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec1u mang máy \u1ea3nh. L\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u chúng ta \u0111i qua hòn \u0111\u1ea3o thì s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ed1i m\u1eb7t v\u1edbi ánh sáng m\u1eb7t tr\u1eddi, vì v\u1eady b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd không may m\u1eafn ch\u1ee5p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1ea3nh \u0111âu. C\u0169ng không sao. Chúng ta s\u1ebd quay l\u1ea1i theo h\u01b0\u1edbng ng\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ea1i trên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng v\u1ec1. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, hãy \u0111i thôi!<\/p>"}

Theo ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói thì nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi nghe có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gì?<\/p>

A. Ch\u1ee3 \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>

B. Vùng hoang dã \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t<\/p>

D. Tác ph\u1ea9m ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

On this trip, you'll learn about the people who lived on Harmon Island many years ago, and you'll view their historic homes. Seeing these structures will give you an idea of how different life was back then.<\/p>","en":"

According to the speaker, what will the listeners be able to see?<\/p>

A. Local markets<\/p>

B. Unusual wildlife<\/p>

C. Historic buildings<\/p>

D. Famous artwork<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

On this trip, you'll learn about the people who lived on Harmon Island many years ago, and you'll view their historic homes. Seeing these structures will give you an idea of how different life was back then.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the speaker imply when he says, “We’ll be coming back the opposite way on the return trip”?
childrens.answers: ["The listeners will be able to take pictures.","There was an error in a travel itinerary.","The listeners can use some lockers.","The listeners should buy souvenirs."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói có ng\u1ee5 ý gì khi anh ta nói \"Chúng ta s\u1ebd quay l\u1ea1i theo h\u01b0\u1edbng ng\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ea1i trên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng v\u1ec1\"?<\/p>

A. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nghe s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee5p hình.<\/p>

B. Có m\u1ed9t l\u1ed7i trong l\u1ecbch du hành<\/p>

C. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nghe có th\u1ec3 dùng m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 t\u1ee7 khóa.<\/p>

D. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nghe nên mua \u0111\u1ed3 l\u01b0u ni\u1ec7m.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Now, I'm sure you all brought your cameras. The first time we pass by the island we'll facing the sun, so you won't have any luck taking photos. That's OK, though. We'll be coming back the opposite way on the return trip.<\/p>","en":"

What does the speaker imply when he says, “We’ll be coming back the opposite way on the return trip”?<\/p>

A. The listeners will be able to take pictures.<\/p>

B. There was an error in a travel itinerary.<\/p>

C. The listeners can use some lockers.<\/p>

D. The listeners should buy souvenirs.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Now, I'm sure you all brought your cameras. The first time we pass by the island we'll facing the sun, so you won't have any luck taking photos. That's OK, though. We'll be coming back the opposite way on the return trip.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Au: To start our meeting off, I'd like to share some good news with you all - we just renewed our contract with Springfield Publishing. We'll continue printing all the books they publish for the next two years. I know we're all happy to hear that. Moving on, several of you have complained that some of the blades in the cutting machines are becoming dull and it's taking longer to cut through thicker books. I just want you to know, I've already called the manufacturer. And now James will introduce the next item on the agenda.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: \u0110\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp c\u1ee7a chúng ta, tôi mu\u1ed1n chia s\u1ebb m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tin t\u1ed1t v\u1edbi các b\u1ea1n - chúng ta v\u1eeba làm m\u1edbi h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng v\u1edbi Hãng Xu\u1ea5t b\u1ea3n Springfield. Chúng ta s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c in t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed1n sách h\u1ecd xu\u1ea5t b\u1ea3n trong hai n\u0103m t\u1edbi. Tôi bi\u1ebft chúng ta r\u1ea5t vui khi nghe \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. Ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c là m\u1ed9t vài trong s\u1ed1 các b\u1ea1n \u0111ã phàn nàn r\u1eb1ng m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee1i dao trong máy c\u1eaft \u0111ang b\u1ecb mòn \u0111i và m\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian h\u01a1n \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1eaft qua nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed1n sách dày. Tôi ch\u1ec9 mu\u1ed1n b\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft là tôi \u0111ã g\u1ecdi cho nhà s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t r\u1ed3i. Và gi\u1edd James s\u1ebd gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u m\u1ee5c ti\u1ebfp theo trong ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ngh\u1ecb s\u1ef1.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Hi, Sung-Wook. Sorry to call so late In the day, but I need your help. (86) Mohammad just called to tell me that a big agricultural producer in Brazil is interested in learning more about our farm equipment. (87) They’re looking to buy some of our tractors and harvesting machines. Anyway, they’re sending a representative here next Friday, and I’ll be leading that meeting. But the thing is, they told us the rep doesn’t speak much English, and I don’t speak any Portuguese. So (88) we’ll need someone who can interpret. Can you look into hiring someone who can help us with that for the day?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào, Sung-Wook. Xin l\u1ed7i vì g\u1ecdi \u0111\u1ebfn mu\u1ed9n vào gi\u1edd này, nh\u01b0ng tôi c\u1ea7n anh giúp. (86) Mohammad v\u1eeba g\u1ecdi \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea3o tôi r\u1eb1ng m\u1ed9t nhà s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nông nghi\u1ec7p l\u1edbn \u1edf Brazil h\u1ee9ng thú \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c tìm hi\u1ec3u thêm v\u1ec1 thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb nông nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a chúng ta. (87) H\u1ecd \u0111ang \u0111\u1ecbnh mua m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 máy kéo và máy thu ho\u1ea1ch c\u1ee7a ta. Dù sao thì, h\u1ecd s\u1ebd c\u1eed m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ây vào th\u1ee9 sáu t\u1edbi, và tôi s\u1ebd ch\u1ee7 trì cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp \u0111ó. Nh\u01b0ng v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 là, h\u1ecd nói v\u1edbi chúng ta r\u1eb1ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n không nói ti\u1ebfng Anh nhi\u1ec1u, và tôi không nói ti\u1ebfng B\u1ed3 \u0110ào Nha. V\u1eady (88) chúng ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi có th\u1ec3 phiên d\u1ecbch. Anh có th\u1ec3 tìm hi\u1ec3u và thuê ng\u01b0\u1eddi có th\u1ec3 giúp chúng ta vào ngày \u0111ó không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Good afternoon! (89) We’re so glad to see such a large turnout at this year’s corporate leadership conference. I’d like to take this opportunity to introduce our keynote speaker, Professor Rosa Jimenez. (90) Dr. Jimenez will be presenting her research on the relationship between personality traits and career success. Since all of you have leadership roles in your organizations, I think you’ll find this information very useful. Before I hand the microphone over to Dr. Jimenez, (91) I’d like to encourage you to visit our Web site to preregister for next year’s leadership conference—if you do so before the end of the month, you’ll receive a discounted registration rate.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u! (89) Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia l\u1edbn nh\u01b0 v\u1eady t\u1ea1i h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o doanh nghi\u1ec7p n\u0103m nay. Tôi mu\u1ed1n l\u1ea5y c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i này \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u di\u1ec5n gi\u1ea3 chính c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, Giáo s\u01b0 Rosa Jimenez. (90) Ti\u1ebfn s\u0129 Jimenez s\u1ebd trình bày nghiên c\u1ee9u c\u1ee7a cô v\u1ec1 m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 gi\u1eefa \u0111\u1eb7c \u0111i\u1ec3m tính cách và thành công ngh\u1ec1 nghi\u1ec7p. Vì t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec1u có vai trò là lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o trong t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c c\u1ee7a mình, tôi ngh\u0129 các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y thông tin này r\u1ea5t h\u1eefu ích. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi tôi giao micro cho Ti\u1ebfn s\u0129 Jimenez, (91) tôi mu\u1ed1n khuy\u1ebfn khích các b\u1ea1n ghé th\u0103m trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký tr\u01b0\u1edbc cho h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o n\u0103m sau - n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n làm nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf tr\u01b0\u1edbc cu\u1ed1i tháng này thì b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giá \u0111\u0103ng ký gi\u1ea3m giá.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Good evening. (92) l’m AlexTalera, the head ranger at Anders National Park. I’m sure many of you have visited the park for hiking or fishing. But, tonight, we’re happy to be hosting our first annual astronomy lecture, giving you the opportunity to sit under the stars and learn about constellations. (93) When we first discussed this idea, we weren’t sure the community would be interested in this lecture. However, as I look out, I see the seating area is almost full! Now, we’re quite a distance from the city lights, which will help us spot multiple constellations. (94) Before we begin, please switch off your mobile phones, as that type of light can also interfere with visibility.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i. (92) Tôi là Alex Talera, tr\u01b0\u1edfng ki\u1ec3m lâm viên t\u1ea1i Công viên Qu\u1ed1c gia Anders. Tôi ch\u1eafc r\u1eb1ng nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi trong s\u1ed1 các b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn th\u0103m công viên \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111i b\u1ed9 hay câu cá. Nh\u01b0ng t\u1ed1i nay, chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c bài gi\u1ea3ng thiên v\u0103n h\u1ecdc hàng n\u0103m \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a chúng tôi và cho b\u1ea1n c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i ng\u1ed3i d\u01b0\u1edbi nh\u1eefng vì sao và h\u1ecdc v\u1ec1 các chòm sao. (93) Khi chúng tôi th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 ý t\u01b0\u1edfng này, chúng tôi \u0111ã không ch\u1eafc là c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng s\u1ebd quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn bài gi\u1ea3ng này cho l\u1eafm. Tuy nhiên, lúc tôi nhìn ra thì tôi \u0111ã th\u1ea5y khu v\u1ef1c ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i g\u1ea7n nh\u01b0 \u0111\u1ea7y c\u1ea3 r\u1ed3i! Bây gi\u1edd, chúng ta \u0111ang \u1edf khá xa ánh sáng c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1 và nó s\u1ebd giúp chúng ta phát hi\u1ec7n nhi\u1ec1u chòm sao. (94) Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u, vui lòng t\u1eaft \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n vì lo\u1ea1i ánh sáng \u0111ó c\u0169ng có th\u1ec3 gây \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1ea7m nhìn.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the speaker imply when he says, “the seating area is almost full”?
childrens.answers: ["More chairs are needed.","Some people cannot attend an event.","A fund-raising goal was reached.","A lecture is popular."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói có ng\u1ee5 ý gì khi ông ta nói: \"Khu v\u1ef1c ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i g\u1ea7n nh\u01b0 \u0111\u1ea7y c\u1ea3\"?<\/p>

A. C\u1ea7n có nhi\u1ec1u gh\u1ebf h\u01a1n.<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi không th\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1 m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n.<\/p>

C. \u0110ã \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ee5c tiêu gây qu\u1ef9 t\u1eeb thi\u1ec7n.<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t bài gi\u1ea3ng tr\u1edf nên n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có thông tin: \"When we first discussed this idea, we weren't sure the community would be interested in this lecture. However, as I look out, I see the seating area is almost full!\". Vì v\u1eady, câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói là cách ông ta bày t\u1ecf s\u1ef1 ng\u1ea1c nhiên tr\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ef1 n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a bài gi\u1ea3ng, do \u0111ó chúng ta ch\u1ecdn (D).<\/p>","en":"

What does the speaker imply when he says, “the seating area is almost full”?<\/p>

A. More chairs are needed.<\/p>

B. Some people cannot attend an event.<\/p>

C. A fund-raising goal was reached.<\/p>

D. A lecture is popular.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information: \"When we first discussed this idea, we weren't sure the community would be interested in this lecture. However, as I look out, I see the seating area is almost full!\" so the speaker's response is his way of expressing how surprise he is at how popular the lecture is, hence we choose (D).<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Br: Hi, Carol? It's Susan. I was just told I'll be leading the team that's developing our newest microwave oven. I'm preparing a draft budget for the development of the new model and have been looking over the expenses from previous projects. Since you worked on a similar project two years ago, would you have time to come by my office? I have a couple of questions that I'd like to ask you. If you can, stop by whenever you have time today. Oh, and don't forget! I moved to the office directly across from the kitchen. See you soon.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào, Carol. Là Susan \u0111ây. Tôi v\u1eeba \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o là mình s\u1ebd d\u1eabn d\u1eaft \u0111\u1ed9i phát tri\u1ec3n lò vi sóng m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Tôi \u0111ang chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb d\u1ef1 th\u1ea3o ngân sách cho s\u1ef1 phát tri\u1ec3n c\u1ee7a mô hình m\u1edbi và \u0111ã xem xét chi phí t\u1eeb các d\u1ef1 án tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Vì cô \u0111ã t\u1eebng làm vi\u1ec7c trong m\u1ed9t d\u1ef1 án gi\u1ed1ng v\u1eady 2 n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc, cô có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không? Tôi có vài câu h\u1ecfi mà tôi mu\u1ed1n h\u1ecfi cô. N\u1ebfu cô có th\u1ec3, hãy ghé qua hôm nay khi cô có th\u1eddi gian. \u1ed2, và \u0111\u1eebng quên! Tôi \u0111ã chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng \u0111\u1ed1i di\u1ec7n nhà b\u1ebfp. H\u1eb9n g\u1eb7p l\u1ea1i cô s\u1edbm.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: (98) l’m glad to see all of our cooks here for this early morning meeting. I have something to tell you about this weekend’s menu. (99) One of our suppliers had a problem with his trucks, so we didn’t receive our delivery from them. This won’t affect anything on our menu except for Saturday’s dinner special. What I’d like you all to do is think about another dish you can cook for Saturday evening. There’s still time to reprint the menu. (100) E-mail me any ideas you have by four p.m. today
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

(98) Tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi th\u1ea5y t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp \u0111\u1ec1u \u1edf \u0111ây trong bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdp sáng s\u1edbm này. Tôi có \u0111i\u1ec1u mu\u1ed1n nói v\u1edbi các b\u1ea1n v\u1ec1 th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n này. (99) M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng nhà cung c\u1ea5p c\u1ee7a chúng ta g\u1eb7p v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 v\u1edbi xe t\u1ea3i c\u1ee7a ông ta, vì v\u1eady chúng ta \u0111ã không nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hàng c\u1ee7a mình. \u0110i\u1ec1u này không \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng gì \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n c\u1ee7a chúng ta tr\u1eeb b\u1eefa t\u1ed1i \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y. \u0110i\u1ec1u tôi mu\u1ed1n các b\u1ea1n làm là ngh\u0129 v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t món \u0103n khác mà b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 n\u1ea5u vào t\u1ed1i th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y. V\u1eabn còn th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 in l\u1ea1i th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n. (100) G\u1eedi e-mail cho tôi b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 ý t\u01b0\u1edfng nào c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n vào 4 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u nay.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Incomplete sentences
parts.title: A word or pharse is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
The mother held her newborn ____

childrens.title: The event planner determined that Tuesday’s forum will require ------- chairs.
childrens.answers: ["addition","additions","additional","additionally"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Nhà t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n xác \u0111\u1ecbnh r\u1eb1ng di\u1ec5n \u0111àn ngày th\u1ee9 ba s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ------- gh\u1ebf.<\/p>

A. s\u1ef1 b\u1ed5 sung (n)<\/p>

B. nh\u1eefng b\u1ed5 sung (n)<\/p>

C. thêm (adj)<\/p>

D. thêm n\u1eefa (adv)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

T\u1eeb chairs \"gh\u1ebf\" là m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb nên chúng ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho nó. Vì v\u1eady, (C) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

The event planner determined that Tuesday’s forum will require ------- chairs.<\/p>

A. addition (n)<\/p>

B. additions (n)<\/p>

C. additional (adj)<\/p>

D. additionally (adv)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The word chairs is a noun so we need an adjective to complement it. Therefore, (C) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ms. Hu will check the storage closet before she ------- more office supplies.
childrens.answers: ["contains","orders","writes","copies"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Cô Hu s\u1ebd ki\u1ec3m tra kho l\u01b0u tr\u1eef tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi cô \u1ea5y ------- cung c\u1ea5p thêm v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng v\u0103n phòng.<\/p>

A. ch\u1ee9a (v)<\/p>

B. \u0111\u1eb7t hàng (v)<\/p>

C. vi\u1ebft (v)<\/p>

D. sao chép (v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb trong m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 này và d\u1ef1a vào ý ngh\u0129a thì (B) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Hu will check the storage closet before she ------- more office supplies.<\/p>

A. contains (v)<\/p>

B. orders (v)<\/p>

C. writes (v)<\/p>

D. copies (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We need a verb in this clause and based on the meaning, (B) is the most correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: All sales staff are asked to acknowledge their -- ----- in Monday’s workshop.
childrens.answers: ["participate","participates","participated","participation"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên bán hàng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u thông báo ------- c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd trong h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o ngày th\u1ee9 hai.<\/p>

A. tham gia (v)<\/p>

B. tham gia (v)<\/p>

C. \u0111ã tham gia (v)<\/p>

D. vi\u1ec7c tham d\u1ef1 (n)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có t\u1eeb their \"c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd\" là m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu và chúng th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111i v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb nên (D) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

All sales staff are asked to acknowledge their -- ----- in Monday’s workshop.<\/p>

A. participate (v)<\/p>

B. participates (v)<\/p>

C. participated (v)<\/p>

D. participation (n)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Explanation:<\/p>

childrens.title: After the lease -------, customers have the option of purchasing the car or returning it to their local dealer.
childrens.answers: ["expired","is expiring","will be expiring","expires"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Sau khi h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng cho thuê -------, khách hàng có quy\u1ec1n mua xe ho\u1eb7c tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi bán hàng t\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng.<\/p>

A. \u0111ã h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n (v)<\/p>

B. \u0111ang h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n (v)<\/p>

C. s\u1ebd h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n (v)<\/p>

D. h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n (v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có c\u1ea5u trúc c\u1ee7a liên t\u1eeb after: After + hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i \u0111\u01a1n \/ hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng sau khi làm \u0111i\u1ec1u gì \u0111ó và s\u1ebd làm m\u1ed9t vi\u1ec7c khác. Tuy nhiên, trong m\u1ed9t m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1, ta không dùng thì t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai \u0111\u01a1n mà dùng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i \u0111\u01a1n ho\u1eb7c hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh hành \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111ã hoàn thành tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi hành \u0111\u1ed9ng khác x\u1ea3y ra. Do \u0111ó, chúng ta ch\u1ecdn (D).<\/p>","en":"

After the lease -------, customers have the option of purchasing the car or returning it to their local dealer.<\/p>

A. expired (v)<\/p>

B. is expiring (v)<\/p>

C. will be expiring (v)<\/p>

D. expires (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the structure of the conjunction after: After + simple present \/ present perfect + simple future which is used after doing something and will do another thing. Although, in a clause, we don't use simple future but use either simple present or present perfect to emphasize the completed action before another action happens. Therefore, we choose (D).<\/p>"}

Câu này có c\u1ea5u trúc c\u1ee7a câu \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n lo\u1ea1i 3: If + S + quá kh\u1ee9 hoàn thành + O, S + would + have + V3\/V-ed + O. Do \u0111ó, chúng ta ch\u1ecdn (C).<\/p>","en":"

D. arriving (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The sentence has the structure of the conditional sentence type 3: If + S + past perfect + O, S + would + have + V3\/V-ed + O. Therefore, we choose (C).<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read: Philadelphia’s PH11-TV invites you to download our new traffic app for your mobile device. The app ---1--- the station’s traffic coverage. Use it to get traffic news if you are away from your television and are unable to watch our traffic reports. --2--. Plus, you can program your daily commute into the app to receive personalized alerts ---3--- on your mobile device when any traffic-related event occurs along your note. Avoid traffic delays by downloading the PH11-TV traffic app today, ---4--- tune in to our live broadcast beginning at 5:00 A.M. and 4:00 P.M. daily.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110ài PH11-TV c\u1ee7a Philadelphia m\u1eddi b\u1ea1n t\u1ea3i v\u1ec1 \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng giao thông m\u1edbi cho \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. \u1ee8ng d\u1ee5ng ---1--- l\u01b0\u1ee3ng tin giao thông c\u1ee7a \u0111ài. Hãy s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nó \u0111\u1ec3 xem tin giao thông n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n không \u1edf g\u1ea7n truy\u1ec1n hình và không th\u1ec3 xem \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tin giao thông c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. --2--. Thêm vào \u0111ó, b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 l\u1eadp ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình cho vi\u1ec7c \u0111i l\u1ea1i h\u1eb1ng ngày c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n vào \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea3nh báo cá nhân ---3--- trên \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i khi có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n giao thông nào \u0111ang di\u1ec5n ra. Tránh b\u1ecb c\u1ea3n tr\u1edf giao thông b\u1eb1ng cách t\u1ea3i \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng giao thông PH11-TV hôm nay, ---4--- xem phát sóng tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp c\u1ee7a chúng tôi lúc 5 gi\u1edd sáng và 4 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u m\u1ed7i ngày.<\/p>"}
