questions.text_read:
To: [email protected]
From: [email protected]
Subject: Online marketing research
Date: April 3
Dear Mr. Gosnell, 

Below are some preliminary conclusions and recommendations based on our analysis of the design of the Brookside Visitors Bureau Web site. First, the site is not as ---1--- as it should be. We recommend updating its appearance and adding information that meets the demands of today’s tourists. Note also that your organization’s logo is not used consistently ---2--- your Web site. You should also consider supplementing the imagery used to promote the city. ---3---. We therefore recommend uploading some professionally made videos featuring the various attractions Brookside has to offer. ---4---, we suggest adding a page to the Web site that allows residents and visitors to upload their own photos and videos of city attractions. Please contact me at your earliest convenience to discuss the next steps.

Best regards,
Shelly Luu
Luu Marketing

Vì th\u1ebf chúng tôi khuyên là nên \u0111\u0103ng m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 video \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm chuyên nghi\u1ec7p gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec3m thu hút mà Brookside mang l\u1ea1i. ---146---, chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb thêm m\u1ed9t trang nh\u1eb1m \u0111\u1ec3 c\u01b0 dân và du khách \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng hình và video c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec3m thu hút c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1, Xin hãy liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi tôi s\u1edbm nh\u1ea5t có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn các b\u01b0\u1edbc ti\u1ebfp theo.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Shelly Luu

A. S\u1ebd không có b\u1ee9c \u1ea3nh nào \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c dùng mà không có gi\u1ea5y \u1ee7y quy\u1ec1n c\u1ee7a tôi<\/p>

B. Vi\u1ec7c tr\u01b0ng bày hình \u1ea3nh không \u0111\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec3 thu hút khách du l\u1ecbch ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng<\/p>

C. Cách s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp hình \u1ea3nh có h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng là \u0111i\u1ec1u thi\u1ebft y\u1ebfu cho vi\u1ec7c tìm ki\u1ebfm d\u1ec5 dàng<\/p>

D. \u1ea2nh ch\u1ee5p không có \u0111\u1ecbnh d\u1ea1ng chính xác \u0111ã b\u1ecb t\u1eeb ch\u1ed1i<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

You should also consider supplementing the imagery used to promote the city.<\/p>

We therefore recommend uploading some professionally made videos featuring the various attractions Brookside has to offer.<\/p>","en":"

---3---<\/p>

A. No photos can be used without my written authorization<\/p>

B. A display of photos is not enough to attract prospective visitors<\/p>

C. A systematic way of filing photo is essential for easy retrieval<\/p>

D. Photos that were not in the proper format have been rejected<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

You should also consider supplementing the imagery used to promote the city.<\/p>

We therefore recommend uploading some professionally made videos featuring the various attractions Brookside has to offer.<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["So that","In addition","To clarify","After all"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

---4---<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 cho (conj) (S + V + so that + S + V)<\/p>

B. Thêm vào \u0111ó (prep) (In addition + S + V...)<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1ec3 làm rõ (v) ((in order) + to + V)<\/p>

D. Dù sao thì (c\u1ee5m gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a, (B) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

---4---<\/p>

A. So that (conj) (S + V + so that + S + V)<\/p>

B. In addition (prep) (in addition + S + V...)<\/p>

C. To clarify (v) ((in order) + to + V)<\/p>

D. After all (prepositional phrase)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the meaning, (B) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
Are you someone who enjoys trying new things and does not feel uncomfortable in new environment? Then why not get paid for it? CULTURE magazine is looking for individuals to go to ne
intro.answers: ["A. a homebody", "B. an introvert", "C. a clumsy person", "D. a risk-taker"]

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Gi\u1eefa Bãi bi\u1ec3n Bellevue và \u0110\u1ea3o Kipsky
Gi\u1eefa Bãi bi\u1ec3n Bellevue và C\u1ea3ng Canary
Hãng V\u1eadn Chuy\u1ec3n Bellevue
Vé gi\u1ea3m giá ngoài cao \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi l\u1edbn
Ng\u01b0\u1eddi mang vé này \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edfng chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i kh\u1ee9 h\u1ed3i không gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n gi\u1eefa các \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfn trong ngày phát hành.
Xin hãy gi\u1eef t\u1ea5m vé này cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi hoàn t\u1ea5t chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, vì nó có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ki\u1ec3m tra b\u1edfi các thành viên \u0111oàn trên phà.
*Vé gi\u1ea3m giá ngoài gi\u1edd cao \u0111i\u1ec3m có hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c ch\u1ec9 t\u1eeb th\u1ee9 hai \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1ee9 n\u0103m, 9 gi\u1edd sáng \u0111\u1ebfn 4 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. Hành khách mu\u1ed1n du l\u1ecbch vào th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m khác có th\u1ec3 nâng c\u1ea5p vé thành vé tàu th\u01b0\u1eddng v\u1edbi giá 5 \u0111ô la.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is true about the ticket?
childrens.answers: ["It was purchased for $5.00.","It can be returned for a cash refund.","It is valid for more than one journey.","It is good for 24 hours."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Cái gì là \u0111úng v\u1ec1 t\u1ea5m vé?<\/p>

A. Nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mua v\u1edbi giá 5 \u0111ô la<\/p>

B. Nó có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ec3 hoàn ti\u1ec1n m\u1eb7t.<\/p>

C. Nó có giá tr\u1ecb cho h\u01a1n m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i.<\/p>

D. Nó dùng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trong 24 gi\u1edd.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

The bearer of this ticket is entitled to unlimited round-trip passage between destinations on the date of issue.<\/p>","en":"

What is true about the ticket?<\/p>

A. It was purchased for $5.00.<\/p>

B. It can be returned for a cash refund.<\/p>

C. It is valid for more than one journey.<\/p>

D. It is good for 24 hours.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

The bearer of this ticket is entitled to unlimited round-trip passage between destinations on the date of issue.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: For what mode of transportation is the ticket?

Vé này dùng cho ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i gì?<\/p>

A. A bus<\/p>

B. A boat<\/p>

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Hi\u1ec7p H\u1ed9i Thi\u1ebft K\u1ebf \u0110\u1ed3 H\u1ecda C\u1ea7n Tuy\u1ec3n
V\u01b0\u1eddn Hoa Th\u1ecb Tr\u1ea5n Zachary(ZTFG) \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi sáng t\u1ea1o và có \u0111\u1ecbnh h\u01b0\u1edbng ngh\u1ec1 nghi\u1ec7p tham gia nhóm làm vi\u1ec7c n\u0103ng \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 bao g\u1ed3m vi\u1ec7c giúp thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf, qu\u1ea3ng cáo, và mua bán các ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a ZTFG v\u1edbi các tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ecdc và các ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n truy\u1ec1n thông trong c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng xung quanh. Trình \u0111\u1ed9 bao g\u1ed3m thành th\u1ea1o s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m v\u0103n phòng và thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf và có kinh nghi\u1ec7m làm vi\u1ec7c tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó t\u1ea1i công ty thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed3 h\u1ecda. L\u1ecbch làm vi\u1ec7c linh ho\u1ea1t. \u0110\u1ec3 \u1ee9ng tuy\u1ec3n, g\u1eedi e-mail m\u1ed9t lá th\u01b0 gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u, s\u01a1 y\u1ebfu lý l\u1ecbch, và hai gi\u1ea5y gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u chuyên nghi\u1ec7p cho \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 jobs@ztfg.org vào ngày 5 tháng 5. \u0110\u1ec3 tìm hi\u1ec3u thêm, hãy ghé qua vào bu\u1ed5i sáng t\u1eeb th\u1ee9 hai \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1ee9 sáu \u0111\u1ec3 tham quan khu v\u01b0\u1eddn.<\/p>"}

Yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a công vi\u1ec7c là gì?<\/p>

A. Có làm vi\u1ec7c tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c phi l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn<\/p>

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

TH\u01af BÁO
\u0110\u1ebfn: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 Nhân viên
T\u1eeb: Don Wunder, Giám \u0110\u1ed1c C\u01a1 s\u1edf V\u1eadt ch\u1ea5t
\u0110\u1ed1i T\u01b0\u1ee3ng: Chanti Workspaces
Ngày: 11 Tháng 2
Trong m\u1ed9t m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i tác \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t v\u1edbi Chanti Workspaces, 5 bàn \u0111\u1ee9ng s\u1ebd có s\u1eb5n cho nhân viên trên c\u01a1 s\u1edf th\u1eed nghi\u1ec7m t\u1eeb ngày 20 tháng 2 \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 15 tháng 3. Bàn \u0111\u1ee9ng cho phép b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ee9ng tho\u1ea3i mái trong khi làm vi\u1ec7c. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng mô hình Chanti B45 m\u1edbi, có th\u1ec3 \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c, vì v\u1eady b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 thay th\u1ebf gi\u1eefa vi\u1ec7c ng\u1ed3i và \u0111\u1ee9ng \u1edf \u0111\u1ed9 cao hoàn h\u1ea3o cho mình. Nghiên c\u1ee9u cho th\u1ea5y các bàn \u0111\u1ee9ng có th\u1ec3 vô hi\u1ec7u hóa m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tác \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt lý gây h\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a vi\u1ec7c ng\u1ed3i quá nhi\u1ec1u. Chúng c\u0169ng có th\u1ec3 c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n tâm tr\u1ea1ng và s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi mu\u1ed1n t\u1eadn d\u1ee5ng c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i này nên liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi tôi. N\u1ebfu m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi có h\u1ee9ng thú h\u01a1n ngoài bàn làm vi\u1ec7c, ng\u01b0\u1eddi nh\u1eadn s\u1ebd là nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi tôi tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng bàn làm vi\u1ec7c s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u tham gia kh\u1ea3o sát v\u1ec1 tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd \u0111\u1ec3 giúp chúng ta xác \u0111\u1ecbnh xem li\u1ec7u chúng ta có nên cung c\u1ea5p s\u1eb5n nh\u1eefng bàn làm vi\u1ec7c cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên không.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is the purpose of the memo?
childrens.answers: ["To ask for help in assembling some furniture","To offer staff a chance to try a new type of furniture","To encourage employees to take exercise classes","To survey worker preferences about office equipment"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

M\u1ee5c \u0111ích c\u1ee7a th\u01b0 báo là gì?<\/p>

A. Yêu c\u1ea7u giúp \u0111\u1ee1 trong vi\u1ec7c l\u1eafp ráp m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t<\/p>

B. T\u1ea1o cho nhân viên c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1eed m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t m\u1edbi<\/p>

C. Khuy\u1ebfn khích nhân viên tham gia các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c<\/p>

D. Kh\u1ea3o sát s\u1edf thích nhân viên v\u1ec1 thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v\u0103n phòng<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

In a special partnership with Chanti Workspaces, five standing desks will be available to employees on a trial basis from February 20 to March 15.<\/p>","en":"

What is the purpose of the memo?<\/p>

A. To ask for help in assembling some furniture<\/p>

B. To offer staff a chance to try a new type of furniture<\/p>

C. To encourage employees to take exercise classes<\/p>

D. To survey worker preferences about office equipment<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

In a special partnership with Chanti Workspaces, five standing desks will be available to employees on a trial basis from February 20 to March 15.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about the Chanti B45 model?
childrens.answers: ["It can be difficult to get used to.","It will increase worker productivity.","It can be adjusted to different heights.","It is the most expensive standing desk."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 mô hình Chanti B45?<\/p>

A. Nó khó \u0111\u1ec3 quen v\u1edbi.<\/p>

B. Nó s\u1ebd t\u0103ng n\u0103ng su\u1ea5t cho nhân viên.<\/p>

C. Nó có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh theo chi\u1ec1u cao khác nhau.<\/p>

D. Nó là cái bàn \u0111\u1ee9ng \u0111\u1eaft ti\u1ec1n nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Standing desks allow you to stand comfortably while working. We will use the new Chanti B45 model, which is adjustable, so you can alternate between sitting and standing at the perfect height for you.<\/p>","en":"

What is indicated about the Chanti B45 model?<\/p>

A. It can be difficult to get used to.<\/p>

B. It will increase worker productivity.<\/p>

C. It can be adjusted to different heights.<\/p>

D. It is the most expensive standing desk.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Standing desks allow you to stand comfortably while working. We will use the new Chanti B45 model, which is adjustable, so you can alternate between sitting and standing at the perfect height for you.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Qing Zhang (3:45 chi\u1ec1u) Chào Amari. Novella Lee không th\u1ec3 tìm th\u1ea5y \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a cô ta. Cô \u1ea5y có \u0111\u1ec3 nó trên l\u1ea7u trong v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a ông không?
Amari Cruzado (3:46 chi\u1ec1u) Có ph\u1ea3i nó n\u1eb1m trong v\u1ecf nh\u1ef1a xanh v\u1edbi bi\u1ec3u t\u01b0\u1ee3ng con voi trên \u0111ó không?
Qing Zhang (3:47 chi\u1ec1u) \u0110úng r\u1ed3i, nó \u0111\u1ea5y. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ang trên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng lên \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y nó.
Amari Cruzado (3:48 chi\u1ec1u) Chìa khóa c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y c\u0169ng \u1edf \u0111ây n\u1eefa. Hôm nay có v\u1ebb cô \u1ea5y b\u1ecb phân tâm.
Qing Zhang (3:49 chi\u1ec1u) Cô có ch\u1eafc là c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y không?
Amari Cruzado (3:50 chi\u1ec1u) Tôi \u0111oán là v\u1eady. Nó \u0111ang n\u1eb1m trên \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What will Ms. Lee most likely do next?
childrens.answers: ["Retrieve some things from upstairs","Order some accessories for her phone","E-mail Mr. Cruzado\u2019s assistant","Borrow Ms. Zhang\u2019s phone"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Cô Lee s\u1ebd làm gì ti\u1ebfp theo?<\/p>

A. L\u1ea5y vài th\u1ee9 \u1edf t\u1ea7ng trên<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1eb7t hàng m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n cho \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y<\/p>

C. G\u1eedi e-mail cho tr\u1ee3 lý c\u1ee7a ông Cruzado<\/p>

D. M\u01b0\u1ee3n \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a cô Zhang<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Qing Zhang (3:45 P.M.) Hi Amari. Novella Lee can't find her phone. Did she leave it upstairs in your office?<\/p>

Amari Cruzado (3:46 P.M.) Is it in a blue plastic case with an emblem of an elephant on it?<\/p>

Qing Zhang (3:47 P.M.) Yes, that's it. She's on her way back up to get it.<\/p>","en":"

What will Ms. Lee most likely do next?<\/p>

A. Retrieve some things from upstairs<\/p>

B. Order some accessories for her phone<\/p>

C. E-mail Mr. Cruzado’s assistant<\/p>

D. Borrow Ms. Zhang’s phone<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Qing Zhang (3:45 P.M.) Hi Amari. Novella Lee can't find her phone. Did she leave it upstairs in your office?<\/p>

Amari Cruzado (3:46 P.M.) Is it in a blue plastic case with an emblem of an elephant on it?<\/p>

Qing Zhang (3:47 P.M.) Yes, that's it. She's on her way back up to get it.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At 3:50 p.m., what does Mr. Cruzado mean when he writes, "I'm guessing"?
childrens.answers: ["He believes that Ms. Lee is often forgetful.","He thinks that Ms. Zhang spoke incorrectly.","He assumes that the keys belong to Ms. Lee.","He wonders if the keys belong to Ms. Zhang."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Vào 3:50 chi\u1ec1u, ông Cruzado có ý gì khi ông \u1ea5y vi\u1ebft, \"Tôi \u0111oán v\u1eady\"?<\/p>

A. Ông ta tin r\u1eb1ng cô Lee hay quên.<\/p>

B. Ông ta ngh\u0129 cô Zhang nói không \u0111úng.<\/p>

C. Ông \u1ea5y cho r\u1eb1ng chìa khóa thu\u1ed9c v\u1ec1 cô Lee.<\/p>

D. Ông \u1ea5y t\u1ef1 h\u1ecfi li\u1ec7u chìa khóa có thu\u1ed9c v\u1ec1 cô Zhang không.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Amari Cruzado (3:48 P.M.) Her keys are here too. She must be distracted today.<\/p>

Qing Zhang (3:49 P.M.) Are you sure they're hers?<\/p>

Amari Cruzado (3:50 P.M.) I'm guessing. They're lying on top of the phone.<\/p>","en":"

At 3:50 p.m., what does Mr. Cruzado mean when he writes, \"I'm guessing\"?<\/p>

A. He believes that Ms. Lee is often forgetful.<\/p>

B. He thinks that Ms. Zhang spoke incorrectly.<\/p>

C. He assumes that the keys belong to Ms. Lee.<\/p>

D. He wonders if the keys belong to Ms. Zhang.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Amari Cruzado (3:48 P.M.) Her keys are here too. She must be distracted today.<\/p>

Qing Zhang (3:49 P.M.) Are you sure they're hers?<\/p>

Amari Cruzado (3:50 P.M.) I'm guessing. They're lying on top of the phone.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Lý t\u01b0\u1edfng cho doanh nghi\u1ec7p m\u1edbi! Tòa nhà m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xây d\u1ef1ng g\u1ea7n \u0111ây này g\u1ed3m có g\u1ea7n 2000 mét vuông không gian v\u0103n phòng, thêm vào \u0111ó là 1000 mét vuông không gian l\u01b0u tr\u1eef và 3000 mét vuông nhà \u0111\u1ec3 xe. -- [1] --. D\u1ec5 dàng di chuy\u1ec3n t\u1eeb trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1 Cloverdale, tòa nhà ch\u1ec9 n\u1eb1m trong ph\u1ea1m vi 500 mét c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u nhà hàng và trung tâm mua s\u1eafm m\u1edbi toanh. -- [2] --. Tòa nhà v\u1edbi ki\u1ec3u thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1eb9p và hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i này \u0111\u1eb7c tr\u01b0ng v\u1edbi c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 t\u1eeb sàn t\u1edbi tr\u1ea7n nhà cung c\u1ea5p m\u1ed9t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng d\u1ed3i dào ánh sáng t\u1ef1 nhiên. — [3] —. H\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng cho thuê trung bình là 12 tháng v\u1edbi ti\u1ec1n thanh toán h\u1eb1ng tháng và ti\u1ec1n \u0111\u1eb7t c\u1ecdc an ninh. -- [4] —. \u0110\u1ec3 n\u1ed9p \u0111\u01a1n xin thuê ho\u1eb7c mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ebfn xem nhà tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp, hãy g\u1ecdi Danna Pulley v\u1edbi s\u1ed1 (519) 555-0139.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: How large is the parking area?
childrens.answers: ["500 square meters","1,000 square meters","2,000 square meters","3,000 square meters"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Khu \u0111\u1ed7 xe l\u1edbn c\u1ee1 nào?<\/p>

A. 500 mét vuông<\/p>

B. 1000 mét vuông<\/p>

C. 2000 mét vuông<\/p>

D. 3000 mét vuông<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

This recently constructed property contains nearly 2,000 square metres of office space, with an additional 1,000 square metres of storage space and a 3,000-square-metre car garage.<\/p>","en":"

How large is the parking area?<\/p>

A. 500 square meters<\/p>

B. 1,000 square meters<\/p>

C. 2,000 square meters<\/p>

D. 3,000 square meters<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

This recently constructed property contains nearly 2,000 square metres of office space, with an additional 1,000 square metres of storage space and a 3,000-square-metre car garage.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is NOT mentioned as an advantage of the property?
childrens.answers: ["It is close to restaurants and stores.","It is a short drive from the airport.","It allows for plenty of sunlight.","It is a relatively new building."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

L\u1ee3i th\u1ebf gì c\u1ee7a tòa nhà không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp?<\/p>

A. Nó g\u1ea7n nhà hàng và c\u1eeda hàng.<\/p>

B. Nó cách sân bay m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i ng\u1eafn.<\/p>

C. Nó mang l\u1ea1i nhi\u1ec1u ánh sáng m\u1eb7t tr\u1eddi.<\/p>

D. Nó là m\u1ed9t tòa nhà t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ed1i m\u1edbi.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên thông tin: \"This recently constructed property contains nearly 2,000 square metres of office space, with an additional 1,000 square metres of storage space and a 3,000-square-metre car garage. Easily accessible from downtown Cloverdale, the property is within 500 metres of several restaurants and a brand-new shopping centre. The sleek, modern design features floor-to-ceiling windows that provide an abundance of natural light.\", chúng ta không th\u1ea5y chi ti\u1ebft \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u1edf (B) nên (B) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

What is NOT mentioned as an advantage of the property?<\/p>

A. It is close to restaurants and stores.<\/p>

B. It is a short drive from the airport.<\/p>

C. It allows for plenty of sunlight.<\/p>

D. It is a relatively new building.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the information: \"This recently constructed property contains nearly 2,000 square metres of office space, with an additional 1,000 square metres of storage space and a 3,000-square-metre car garage. Easily accessible from downtown Cloverdale, the property is within 500 metres of several restaurants and a brand-new shopping centre. The sleek, modern design features floor-to-ceiling windows that provide an abundance of natural light.\", we see no detail being mentioned at (B) so (B) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong?  "Longer terms can be negotiated, depending on the needs of the applicant."
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Trong nh\u1eefng v\u1ecb trí \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u [1], [2], [3], và [4] thì câu \"Th\u1eddi h\u1ea1n dài h\u01a1n có th\u1ec3 th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn, tùy vào nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi xin thuê.\" phù h\u1ee3p nh\u1ea5t \u1edf v\u1ecb trí nào?<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên thông tin: \"The standard lease is for twelve months with monthly payments and a security deposit.\", (D) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? \"Longer terms can be negotiated, depending on the needs of the applicant.\"<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the information: \"The standard lease is for twelve months with monthly payments and a security deposit.\", (D) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Rafael Vargas
T\u1eeb: Bon-Hwa Oh
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Thông tin
Ngày: 1 Tháng 10
G\u1eedi Rafael:
Vi\u1ec7c khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u0103n phòng sân bay m\u1edbi bây gi\u1edd s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t vào th\u1ee9 hai, ngày 3 tháng 11, vì m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ch\u1eadm tr\u1ec5 gây ra b\u1edfi vi\u1ec7c thi công b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd \u1edf Tr\u1ea1m A. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eedi e-mail cho anh thêm chi ti\u1ebft vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n này, cùng v\u1edbi yêu c\u1ea7u anh tham gia cùng chúng tôi. S\u1ebd th\u1eadt t\u1ed1t khi có ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb v\u0103n phòng công ty tham d\u1ef1. Nh\u01b0 tôi \u0111ã lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch, chúng ta s\u1ebd \u0103n m\u1eebng vi\u1ec7c di d\u1eddi c\u1ee7a mình v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t tháng th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t v\u1edbi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 giá thuê xe. Tôi c\u0169ng \u0111ã s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp cho chúng ta h\u1ee3p tác v\u1edbi Hãng hàng không Moonray cho gói chuy\u1ebfn bay \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t và di chuy\u1ec3n b\u1eb1ng xe h\u01a1i. M\u1eb7c dù chúng ta mong \u0111\u1ee3i nhi\u1ec1u khách hàng c\u1ee7a mình s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c là khách du l\u1ecbch kinh doanh, ta c\u0169ng hy v\u1ecdng s\u1ebd thu hút du khách n\u1eefa.
Tôi mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eb7p anh vào tháng t\u1edbi.
Bon-Hwa Oh<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The word “set” in paragraph 1, line 1, is closest in meaning to
childrens.answers: ["scheduled","attached","trained","raised"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb \"set\" trong \u0111o\u1ea1n 1, dòng 1, có ngh\u0129a g\u1ea7n nh\u1ea5t v\u1edbi<\/p>

A. lên l\u1ecbch<\/p>

B. \u0111ính kèm<\/p>

C. \u0111ào t\u1ea1o<\/p>

D. nuôi n\u1ea5ng<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\"Set\" là m\u1ed9t t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ed3ng ngh\u0129a c\u1ee7a scheduled \"lên l\u1ecbch\" nên (A) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

The word “set” in paragraph 1, line 1, is closest in meaning to<\/p>

A. scheduled<\/p>

B. attached<\/p>

C. trained<\/p>

D. raised<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Set is a synonym of scheduled so (A) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does Mr. Oh suggest in his e-mail?
childrens.answers: ["He has corrected a mistake.","He has visited the corporate office.","He is a newly hired employee.","He is responsible for an office relocation."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì ng\u1ee5 ý v\u1ec1 anh Oh trong email?<\/p>

A. Anh ta \u0111ã s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa m\u1ed9t sai sót.<\/p>

B. Anh \u1ea5y \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng công ty.<\/p>

C. Anh ta là nhân viên m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thuê.<\/p>

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

The opening at the new airport office here is now set for Monday, 3 November, because of a delay caused by some unexpected construction in Terminal A. I will e-mail you more details later this week, along with a request that you join us here. It would be great to have someone attend from the corporate office. As I have planned, we will celebrate our relocation with a month of special deals on all car rentals.<\/p>","en":"

What does Mr. Oh suggest in his e-mail?<\/p>

A. He has corrected a mistake.<\/p>

B. He has visited the corporate office.<\/p>

C. He is a newly hired employee.<\/p>

D. He is responsible for an office relocation.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

The opening at the new airport office here is now set for Monday, 3 November, because of a delay caused by some unexpected construction in Terminal A. I will e-mail you more details later this week, along with a request that you join us here. It would be great to have someone attend from the corporate office. As I have planned, we will celebrate our relocation with a month of special deals on all car rentals.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is expected to open on November 3 ?

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eadp \u0110oàn Y Khoa Saunderson - S\u1ed1 46 \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng Manuka - Karori, Wellington 6012
12 tháng 9
Kính th\u01b0a B\u1ec7nh nhân c\u1ee7a T\u1eadp \u0110oàn Y Khoa Saunderson:
T\u1eadp \u0110oàn Y Khoa Saunderson (SMG) c\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n vì \u0111ã ch\u1ecdn chúng tôi làm nhà cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ch\u0103m sóc s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe cho b\u1ea1n. Trong su\u1ed1t 35 n\u0103m l\u1ecbch s\u1eed, chúng tôi \u0111ã ch\u1eefa tr\u1ecb thành công hàng ngàn b\u1ec7nh nhân \u1edf Karori. V\u1edbi s\u1ef1 thay \u0111\u1ed5i nhanh chóng trong th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng ch\u0103m sóc s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe, chúng tôi \u0111ã tìm ra cách hay nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c cung c\u1ea5p tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t cho b\u1ec7nh nhân c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Cu\u1ed1i cùng, chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui m\u1eebng thông báo r\u1eb1ng SMG s\u1ebd sáp nh\u1eadp v\u1edbi Keefe Health vào ngày 1 tháng 10.
\u0110i\u1ec1u này có ý ngh\u0129a gì v\u1edbi b\u1ea1n? Ch\u1ec9 có tên chúng tôi là thay \u0111\u1ed5i; b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u vào tháng sau chúng tôi s\u1ebd tr\u1edf thành Keefe Health Karori. Bác s\u0129 c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd v\u1eabn gi\u1eef nguyên, và b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c g\u1eb7p bác s\u0129 \u1edf \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m Karori c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Tuy nhiên, bây gi\u1edd chúng tôi s\u1ebd có m\u1eb7t t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các bác s\u0129 tài n\u0103ng và chuyên gia t\u1eeb m\u1ea1ng l\u01b0\u1edbi c\u1ee7a Keefe Health nh\u1eb1m cung c\u1ea5p cho b\u1ea1n m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1t các d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ch\u1ea9n \u0111oán và \u0111i\u1ec1u tr\u1ecb m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng. Keefe Health \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c liên t\u1ee5c x\u1ebfp h\u1ea1ng hàng \u0111\u1ea7u trong t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các nhà cung c\u1ea5p y t\u1ebf \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c \u0111ô th\u1ecb l\u1edbn h\u01a1n v\u1ec1 chuyên môn và k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 \u0111i\u1ec1u tr\u1ecb b\u1ec7nh nhân.
\u0110\u1ec3 tìm hi\u1ec3u thêm v\u1ec1 Keefe Health, hãy truy c\u1eadp trang web c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd t\u1ea1i www.keefehealth.co.nz. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n lên l\u1ecbch h\u1eb9n, vui lòng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.
Chúng tôi mong mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c ch\u0103m sóc cho b\u1ea1n.
Chân thành,
T\u1eadp \u0110oàn Y Khoa Saunderson<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is the purpose of the letter?
childrens.answers: ["To thank patients for their patronage","To advise patients about a business merger","To introduce a new doctor on staff","To announce the opening of a branch office"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

M\u1ee5c \u0111ích c\u1ee7a b\u1ee9c th\u01b0 là gì?<\/p>

A. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ec7nh nhân vì s\u1ef1 lui t\u1edbi c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd<\/p>

B. Báo cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ec7nh v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 sáp nh\u1eadp doanh nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>

C. Gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u m\u1ed9t bác s\u0129 m\u1edbi trong \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 nhân viên<\/p>

D. Công b\u1ed1 vi\u1ec7c m\u1edf v\u0103n phòng chi nhánh<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Toward that end, we are pleased to announce that SMG will join with Keefe Health effective 1 October.<\/p>

What does this mean for you? Only our name will change; beginning next month we will become Keefe Health Karori. Your physician will remain the same, and you may continue to see your doctor at our Karori location.<\/p>","en":"

What is the purpose of the letter?<\/p>

A. To thank patients for their patronage<\/p>

B. To advise patients about a business merger<\/p>

C. To introduce a new doctor on staff<\/p>

D. To announce the opening of a branch office<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Toward that end, we are pleased to announce that SMG will join with Keefe Health effective 1 October.<\/p>

What does this mean for you? Only our name will change; beginning next month we will become Keefe Health Karori. Your physician will remain the same, and you may continue to see your doctor at our Karori location.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is suggested about Keefe Health?
childrens.answers: ["It offers medical options that SMG does not offer.","Its location is inconvenient for Karori residents.","Its patients will soon receive the letter.","It has been in business for 35 years."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1ee3i ý v\u1ec1 Keefe Health?<\/p>

A. Nó cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn y t\u1ebf mà SMG không có.<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ee7a nó r\u1ea5t b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi dân Karori.<\/p>

C. B\u1ec7nh nhân c\u1ee7a nó s\u1ebd s\u1edbm nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u01b0.<\/p>

D. Nó \u0111ã ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kinh doanh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c 35 n\u0103m.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

However, we will now have available all of the talented doctors and specialists from the Keefe Health network to offer you a broader range of diagnostic services and treatments. Keefe Health is consistently ranked at the top of all medical providers in the larger metropolitan area for expertise and patient outcomes.<\/p>","en":"

What is suggested about Keefe Health?<\/p>

A. It offers medical options that SMG does not offer.<\/p>

B. Its location is inconvenient for Karori residents.<\/p>

C. Its patients will soon receive the letter.<\/p>

D. It has been in business for 35 years.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

However, we will now have available all of the talented doctors and specialists from the Keefe Health network to offer you a broader range of diagnostic services and treatments. Keefe Health is consistently ranked at the top of all medical providers in the larger metropolitan area for expertise and patient outcomes.<\/p>"}

childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Theo lá th\u01b0 thì ng\u01b0\u1eddi nh\u1eadn ph\u1ea3i làm gì \u0111\u1ec3 lên l\u1ecbch h\u1eb9n?<\/p>

A. Th\u0103m trang web c\u1ee7a Keefe Health<\/p>

To learn more about Keefe Health, visit its Web site at www.keefehealth.co.nz. If you wish to schedule an appointment, please use our existing phone number.<\/p>","en":"

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Will Frankel (4:32 chi\u1ec1u): Ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ebfn công ty c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u bu\u1ed5i hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n an toàn vào th\u1ee9 hai ch\u01b0a?
Donna Davis (4:33 chi\u1ec1u): Vâng. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1ea1i ZRC Tech vào 2: 30 chi\u1ec1u th\u1ee9 hai. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1ebd g\u1eb7p h\u1ecd \u1edf qu\u1ea7y b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 và d\u1eabn h\u1ecd vào ch\u1ed7 d\u1ea1y ph\u1ea3i không?
Will Frankel (4:34 chi\u1ec1u): Tr\u1ee3 lý c\u1ee7a tôi có th\u1ec3 làm \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó.
Donna Davis (4:35 chi\u1ec1u): Các phòng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t máy tính và b\u1ea3ng tr\u1eafng ch\u1ee9?
Violet Menja (4:35 chi\u1ec1u): Nh\u01b0 Will \u0111ã nói, tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eb7p các gi\u1ea3ng viên \u1edf qu\u1ea7y b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 và l\u1ea5y cho h\u1ecd gi\u1ea5y phép vào th\u0103m.
Will Frankel (4:37 chi\u1ec1u): Chúng tôi s\u1ebd s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng hai phòng h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb l\u1edbn có m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 mà các gi\u1ea3ng viên c\u1ea7n.
Violet Menja (4:38 chi\u1ec1u): Các k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt viên phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m s\u1ebd xong ca c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd tr\u01b0\u1edbc 3:00, nên h\u1ecd có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1eb3ng vào bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdc. Tôi s\u1ebd \u1edf \u0111ây \u0111\u1ec3 giúp m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i.
Donna Davis (4:41 chi\u1ec1u): T\u1ed1t l\u1eafm. Bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdc k\u1ebft thúc lúc 5 gi\u1edd. Hai ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1ebd \u1edf \u0111ó ch\u1ee9? Gi\u1ea3ng viên có c\u1ea7n khóa c\u1eeda l\u1ea1i không?
Will Frankel (4:42 chi\u1ec1u): Tôi s\u1ebd \u1edf \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 khóa c\u1eeda phòng khi h\u1ecd xong vi\u1ec7c.
Donna Davis (4:43 chi\u1ec1u): T\u1ed1t. V\u1eady thôi.
Will Frankel (4:44 chi\u1ec1u): Tôi \u1edf \u0111ây cho \u0111\u1ebfn 5:30 n\u1ebfu cô c\u1ea7n gì vào chi\u1ec1u nay.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why did Mr. Frankel contact Ms. Davis?
childrens.answers: ["To propose a change to a schedule","To request a security form","To order laboratory supplies","To confirm special arrangements"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ông Frankel l\u1ea1i liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi cô Davis?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t thay \u0111\u1ed5i l\u1ecbch trình<\/p>

B. Yêu c\u1ea7u xin m\u1eabu \u0111\u01a1n an ninh<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1eb7t hàng v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m<\/p>

D. Xác nh\u1eadn cu\u1ed9c s\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Will Frankel (4:32 P.M.): Are the instructors that are being sent over to our company ready to begin the safety training sessions on Monday?<\/p>","en":"

Why did Mr. Frankel contact Ms. Davis?<\/p>

A. To propose a change to a schedule<\/p>

B. To request a security form<\/p>

C. To order laboratory supplies<\/p>

D. To confirm special arrangements<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Will Frankel (4:32 P.M.): Are the instructors that are being sent over to our company ready to begin the safety training sessions on Monday?<\/p>"}

childrens.title: When will Ms. Menja be at the security desk?
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Khi nào thì cô Menja s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn qu\u1ea7y b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7?<\/p>

A. Lúc 2:30 chi\u1ec1u.<\/p>

B. Lúc 3 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u.<\/p>

C. Lúc 5 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u.<\/p>

D. Lúc 5:30 chi\u1ec1u.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Donna Davis (4:33 P.M.): Yes. They'll arrive there at ZRC Tech at 2:30 on Monday afternoon. Someone will meet them at the security desk and show them where they'll be teaching, right?<\/p>

Will Frankel (4:34 P.M.): My assistant can help with that.<\/p>

Violet Menja (4:35 P.M.): As Will stated, I'll meet the instructors at the security desk and get them visitor passes.<\/p>","en":"

When will Ms. Menja be at the security desk?<\/p>

A. At 2:30 p.m.<\/p>

B. At 3:00 p.m.<\/p>

C. At 5:00 p.m.<\/p>

D. At 5:30 p.m.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Donna Davis (4:33 P.M.): Yes. They'll arrive there at ZRC Tech at 2:30 on Monday afternoon. Someone will meet them at the security desk and show them where they'll be teaching, right?<\/p>

Will Frankel (4:34 P.M.): My assistant can help with that.<\/p>

Violet Menja (4:35 P.M.): As Will stated, I'll meet the instructors at the security desk and get them visitor passes.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about the lab technicians?
childrens.answers: ["They have recently been hired.","They will attend training sessions after work.","They will have a break in the afternoon.","They have previously met Ms. Davis."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ng\u1ee5 ý v\u1ec1 các k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt viên phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m?<\/p>

A. H\u1ecd \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thuê g\u1ea7n \u0111ây<\/p>

B. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd tham d\u1ef1 bu\u1ed5i hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n sau gi\u1edd làm vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>

C. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd ngh\u1ec9 vào bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u.<\/p>

D. H\u1ecd \u0111ã g\u1eb7p cô Davis.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Violet Menja (4:38 P.M.): The lab technicians will finish up their shifts just before 3:00, so they can go straight to their sessions. I'll be around to help get everyone settled.<\/p>","en":"

What is indicated about the lab technicians?<\/p>

A. They have recently been hired.<\/p>

B. They will attend training sessions after work.<\/p>

C. They will have a break in the afternoon.<\/p>

D. They have previously met Ms. Davis.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Violet Menja (4:38 P.M.): The lab technicians will finish up their shifts just before 3:00, so they can go straight to their sessions. I'll be around to help get everyone settled.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At 4:43 p.m., what does Ms. Davis mean when she writes, “That’s it, then"?
childrens.answers: ["She does not have any more questions.","She does not think the doors should be locked.","She believes that Mr. Frankel has a good idea.","She has finished closing up the rooms."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Vào lúc 4:43 chi\u1ec1u, cô Davis có ý gì khi cô \u1ea5y vi\u1ebft, \"V\u1eady thôi\"?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y không còn câu h\u1ecfi nào n\u1eefa.<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y không ngh\u0129 là c\u1eeda nên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khóa.<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y tin r\u1eb1ng anh Frankel có ý ki\u1ebfn hay.<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã \u0111óng xong c\u1eeda phòng.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a và cu\u1ed9c trò chuy\u1ec7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó, (A) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

At 4:43 p.m., what does Ms. Davis mean when she writes, “That’s it, then\"?<\/p>

A. She does not have any more questions.<\/p>

B. She does not think the doors should be locked.<\/p>

C. She believes that Mr. Frankel has a good idea.<\/p>

D. She has finished closing up the rooms.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the meaning and the previous conversation, (A) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: Kira Takamatsu
\u0110\u1ebfn: Eric Sutherland
Subject: Bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdp k\u1ebf ti\u1ebfp
Ngày: 8 Tháng 3
G\u1eedi Eric,
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã chia s\u1ebb m\u1ed1i lo l\u1eafng c\u1ee7a anh v\u1ec1 kh\u1ed1i l\u01b0\u1ee3ng công vi\u1ec7c. - [1] - Chúng tôi \u0111ang làm h\u1ebft s\u1ee9c có th\u1ec3 vi\u1ec7c phân b\u1ed5 d\u1ef1 án \u0111\u1ec3 nhân viên có th\u1ec3 hoàn thành chúng trong ngày làm vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a tu\u1ea7n. - [2]-. Vì g\u1ea7n \u0111ây chúng tôi có thêm vi\u1ec7c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf bìa sách vào danh sách công vi\u1ec7c \u0111ã \u0111\u1ea7y c\u1ee7a anh, chúng tôi \u0111ã quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh giao cho anh m\u1ed9t tr\u1ee3 lý, là thành viên m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a t\u1ed5 tên Hugo Rynkowski. – [3] — . Anh s\u1ebd giám sát công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a anh ta, bao g\u1ed3m t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 áp phích, logo, và các d\u1ef1 án b\u1ed1 trí danh m\u1ee5c.
Khi anh Rynkowski \u0111\u1ebfn vào th\u1ee9 hai t\u1edbi, anh s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i chia s\u1ebb t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 thông tin c\u1ee7a khách hàng mình v\u1edbi anh ta, bao g\u1ed3m c\u1ea3 mô t\u1ea3 chung và các yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3. Anh s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m cho vi\u1ec7c h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn anh \u1ea5y v\u1ec1 ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf c\u1ee7a chúng ta c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng khác mà anh \u0111ang s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.
N\u1ebfu anh có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 m\u1ed1i lo ng\u1ea1i nào khác, xin \u0111\u1eebng ng\u1ea7n ng\u1ea1i chia s\u1ebb v\u1edbi tôi. - [41] -.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Kira Takamatsu<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Who most likely is Mr. Sutherland?
childrens.answers: ["A computer programmer","A graphic designer","A company manager","A writer"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Anh Sutherland có th\u1ec3 là ai?<\/p>

A. L\u1eadp trình viên máy tính<\/p>

B. Nhà thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed3 h\u1ecda<\/p>

C. Giám \u0111\u1ed1c công ty<\/p>

D. Nhà v\u0103n<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Since we recently added book-cover design to your already full list of responsibilities, we have decided to assign an assistant to you, a new team member named Hugo Rynkowski.<\/p>","en":"

Who most likely is Mr. Sutherland?<\/p>

A. A computer programmer<\/p>

B. A graphic designer<\/p>

C. A company manager<\/p>

D. A writer<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Since we recently added book-cover design to your already full list of responsibilities, we have decided to assign an assistant to you, a new team member named Hugo Rynkowski.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What problem did Mr. Sutherland report?
childrens.answers: ["Inconvenient scheduling","Outdated software","Long commutes","Too much work"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Anh Sutherland \u0111ã báo v\u1ec1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì?<\/p>

A. L\u1ecbch trình b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n<\/p>

Thank you for sharing your concerns about your workload. We do our best to distribute projects so that employees can complete them during the regular workweek.<\/p>","en":"

childrens.title: What is Mr. Sutherland asked to do next week?
childrens.answers: ["Prepare a report","Meet a potential client","Train a new employee","Create a job description"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Anh Sutherland \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u làm gì vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi?<\/p>

A. Chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb báo cáo<\/p>

B. G\u1eb7p khách hàng ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng<\/p>

C. \u0110ào t\u1ea1o m\u1ed9t nhân viên m\u1edbi<\/p>

D. T\u1ea1o b\u1ea3ng mô t\u1ea3 công vi\u1ec7c<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

When Mr. Rynkowski arrives next Monday, you will need to share with him all of your clients' information, including general descriptions and specific requirements. You will be responsible for instructing him on our design software as well as all other systems that you are using.<\/p>","en":"

What is Mr. Sutherland asked to do next week?<\/p>

A. Prepare a report<\/p>

B. Meet a potential client<\/p>

C. Train a new employee<\/p>

D. Create a job description<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

When Mr. Rynkowski arrives next Monday, you will need to share with him all of your clients' information, including general descriptions and specific requirements. You will be responsible for instructing him on our design software as well as all other systems that you are using.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong?  “This new hire will support you in most of your tasks.”
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Trong nh\u1eefng v\u1ecb trí \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u [1], [2], [3], và [4] thì câu \"Ng\u01b0\u1eddi m\u1edbi này s\u1ebd h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 anh trong h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5\" phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi v\u1ecb trí nào nh\u1ea5t?<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Since we recently added book-cover design to your already full list of responsibilities, we have decided to assign an assistant to you, a new team member named Hugo Rynkowski.<\/p>

You will oversee his work, including all poster, logo, and catalog layout projects.<\/p>","en":"

In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? “This new hire will support you in most of your tasks.”<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Since we recently added book-cover design to your already full list of responsibilities, we have decided to assign an assistant to you, a new team member named Hugo Rynkowski.<\/p>

You will oversee his work, including all poster, logo, and catalog layout projects.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1p Chí Tin T\u1ee9c Di\u1ec5n \u0110àn Perth
D\u01b0\u1edbi Bi\u1ec3n Xanh
(2 tháng 11) N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n \u0111ang tìm Sara Nannup, hãy b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1eb1ng cách ki\u1ec3m tra d\u01b0\u1edbi bi\u1ec3n. \u0110ó là n\u01a1i cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã ch\u1ee5p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng hình \u1ea3nh trong cu\u1ed1n sách nhi\u1ebfp \u1ea3nh m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a cô, D\u01b0\u1edbi Bi\u1ec3n Xanh.
Cô Nannup b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh khi cha cô \u1ea5y cho cô \u1ea5y m\u1ed9t cái máy \u1ea3nh ch\u1ee5p t\u1ee9c th\u1eddi d\u1ec5 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho sinh nh\u1eadt th\u1ee9 5 c\u1ee7a cô. Tuy nhiên, khi cô h\u1ecdc \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc, cô \u0111\u1eb7t máy quay xu\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1ec3 theo \u0111u\u1ed5i s\u1ef1 nghi\u1ec7p báo chí.
Sau khi t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p, cô Nannup \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thuê làm m\u1ed9t nhà v\u0103n \u1edf T\u1ea1p Chí Tin T\u1ee9c Di\u1ec5n \u0110àn Perth và có ít th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh. \u0110i\u1ec1u \u0111ó \u0111ã thay \u0111\u1ed5i khi cô \u1ea5y tham d\u1ef1 m\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o nhi\u1ebfp \u1ea3nh d\u01b0\u1edbi n\u01b0\u1edbc trong khi \u0111i ngh\u1ec9 mát \u1edf Bali, Indonesia. S\u1edf thích nhi\u1ebfp \u1ea3nh c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u1ed3i ph\u1ee5c l\u1ea1i, và cu\u1ed1i cùng cô \u0111ã r\u1eddi b\u1ecf công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1ed1ng hi\u1ebfn b\u1ea3n thân mình cho nhi\u1ebfp \u1ea3nh toàn th\u1eddi gian. M\u1eb7c dù cô \u1ea5y b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u v\u1edbi chi\u1ebfc máy \u1ea3nh t\u1ee9c th\u1eddi c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ee9a tr\u1ebb, cô Nannup hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi các máy quay công ngh\u1ec7 cao d\u01b0\u1edbi n\u01b0\u1edbc. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed1i phó v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 hao mòn, cô c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb c\u1ee7a mình m\u1ed7i l\u1ea7n vài n\u0103m. \"N\u01b0\u1edbc mu\u1ed1i và cát t\u1ea1o ra nh\u1eefng khó kh\u0103n cho thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh d\u01b0\u1edbi n\u01b0\u1edbc và nó v\u01b0\u1ee3t xa nh\u1eefng gì máy \u1ea3nh th\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ebd g\u1eb7p,\" cô \u1ea5y nói.
Sau nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m \u0111i l\u1eb7n và ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh, cô v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a m\u1ec7t m\u1ecfi v\u1edbi ngh\u1ec1 c\u1ee7a mình.
H\u1ea7u h\u1ebft công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a cô Nannup, bao g\u1ed3m \u1ea5n ph\u1ea9m m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t, t\u1eadp trung vào \u0111\u1ea1i d\u01b0\u01a1ng xung quanh Úc. Tuy nhiên, vào tháng 5, cô s\u1ebd \u0111i \u0111\u1ebfn Hy L\u1ea1p \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh nh\u1eefng tàn tích d\u01b0\u1edbi n\u01b0\u1edbc \u1edf \u0110\u1ecba Trung H\u1ea3i cho cu\u1ed1n sách ti\u1ebfp theo c\u1ee7a cô.
Truy c\u1eadp trang www.saranannup.com.au \u0111\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thêm thông tin v\u1ec1 cô Nannup và công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is the purpose of the article?
childrens.answers: ["To profile a former newspaper employee","To offer photography advice","To promote an online newspaper column","To advertise a photography exhibition"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

M\u1ee5c \u0111ích c\u1ee7a bài báo là gì?<\/p>

A. S\u01a1 l\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ec3u s\u1eed c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t nhân viên tòa so\u1ea1n c\u0169<\/p>

B. Cung c\u1ea5p l\u1eddi khuyên ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh<\/p>

C. Qu\u1ea3ng bá m\u1ed9t m\u1ee5c báo tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn<\/p>

D. Qu\u1ea3ng cáo tri\u1ec3n lãm nhi\u1ebfp \u1ea3nh<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

After she graduated, Ms. Nannup was hired as a staff writer by the Perth Daily Tribune and had little time for taking pictures.<\/p>","en":"

What is the purpose of the article?<\/p>

A. To profile a former newspaper employee<\/p>

B. To offer photography advice<\/p>

C. To promote an online newspaper column<\/p>

D. To advertise a photography exhibition<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

After she graduated, Ms. Nannup was hired as a staff writer by the Perth Daily Tribune and had little time for taking pictures.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What inspired Ms. Nannup to take underwater photographs?
childrens.answers: ["Advice from her father","A job in Indonesia","A special workshop","A journalism class"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111ã truy\u1ec1n c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng cho cô Nannup ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh d\u01b0\u1edbi n\u01b0\u1edbc?<\/p>

A. L\u1eddi khuyên t\u1eeb cha cô \u1ea5y<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t công vi\u1ec7c \u1edf Indonesia<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc báo chí<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

That changed when she attended an underwater photography workshop while on vacation in Bali, Indonesia. There her interest in photography was renewed, and she eventually left her job at the newspaper to devote herself to photography full-time.<\/p>","en":"

What inspired Ms. Nannup to take underwater photographs?<\/p>

A. Advice from her father<\/p>

B. A job in Indonesia<\/p>

C. A special workshop<\/p>

D. A journalism class<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

That changed when she attended an underwater photography workshop while on vacation in Bali, Indonesia. There her interest in photography was renewed, and she eventually left her job at the newspaper to devote herself to photography full-time.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The word “pose" in paragraph 4, line 6, is closest in meaning to
childrens.answers: ["model","check","ask","present"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb \"pose\" \u1edf \u0111o\u1ea1n 4, dòng 6, có ngh\u0129a g\u1ea7n nh\u1ea5t v\u1edbi<\/p>

A. làm m\u1eabu<\/p>

B. ki\u1ec3m tra<\/p>

C. h\u1ecfi<\/p>

D. \u0111\u01b0a ra<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\"pose\" là m\u1ed9t t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ed3ng ngh\u0129a c\u1ee7a present \"\u0111\u01b0a ra\" nên ta ch\u1ecdn (D).<\/p>","en":"

The word \"pose\" in paragraph 4, line 6, is closest in meaning to<\/p>

A. model<\/p>

B. check<\/p>

C. ask<\/p>

D. present<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

\"pose\" is a synonym of present so we choose (D).<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about Ms. Nannup?
childrens.answers: ["She is an experienced diver.","She will soon publish her first book.","She has taken photographs in Greece.","She has used the same camera for many years."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 cô Nannup?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y là m\u1ed9t th\u1ee3 l\u1eb7n \u0111\u1ea7y kinh nghi\u1ec7m.<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd s\u1edbm xu\u1ea5t b\u1ea3n cu\u1ed1n sách \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh \u1edf Hy L\u1ea1p.<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cùng m\u1ed9t cái máy \u1ea3nh trong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

After years now of diving and taking pictures, she has yet to tire of her profession. \"I still love being able to show people images of creatures and places that they have never seen,\" says Ms. Nannup.<\/p>","en":"

What is indicated about Ms. Nannup?<\/p>

A. She is an experienced diver.<\/p>

B. She will soon publish her first book.<\/p>

C. She has taken photographs in Greece.<\/p>

D. She has used the same camera for many years.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

After years now of diving and taking pictures, she has yet to tire of her profession. \"I still love being able to show people images of creatures and places that they have never seen,\" says Ms. Nannup.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eacP \u0110OÀN WESTWOOD PROPERTIES
Khu Nhà \u1ede T\u1eadp Th\u1ec3
T\u1eadp \u0111oàn Westwood Properties (WPI), có hai chung c\u01b0 t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 \u1edf thành ph\u1ed1 Kentville.
Trang Viên Hillside S\u1ed1 222 \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng Jackson
\u0110\u1eb7c \u0111i\u1ec3m: - 2 và 3 \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb phòng ng\u1ee7 v\u1edbi máy gi\u1eb7t và máy s\u1ea5y.
- H\u1ed3 b\u01a1i c\u1ed9ng v\u1edbi sân bóng r\u1ed5 và sân qu\u1ea7n v\u1ee3t.
- Công viên tr\u1ebb em g\u1ea7n \u0111ó
- Các tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ecdc x\u1ebfp h\u1ea1ng hàng \u0111\u1ea7u trong khu v\u1ef1c
- Cách khu kinh doanh 5 phút
- Môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng thân thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi thú c\u01b0ng
Lakeview Oaks S\u1ed1 119 Ph\u1ed1 E. Corfu
\u0110\u1eb7c \u0111i\u1ec3m: - 1 \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb phòng ng\u1ee7 v\u1edbi nhà b\u1ebfp và phòng t\u1eafm l\u1edbn
- Sàn g\u1ed7 c\u1ee9ng
- Phòng gi\u1eb7t \u1ee7i qu\u1ea7n áo t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 \u1edf m\u1ed7i t\u1ea7ng
- Trung tâm th\u1ec3 ch\u1ea5t và b\u1ec3 b\u01a1i ngoài tr\u1eddi
- \u0110i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u tuy\u1ebfn bus ngay ngoài c\u1eeda
- Cách khu kinh doanh 10 phút
- Môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng thân thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi thú c\u01b0ng
Truy c\u1eadp trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ea1i www.westwoodproperties.com \u0111\u1ec3 xem s\u01a1 \u0111\u1ed3 t\u1ea7ng l\u1ea7u ho\u1eb7c lên l\u1ecbch tham quan riêng. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n bán hàng s\u1ebd có m\u1eb7t t\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi các câu h\u1ecfi c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n t\u1eeb th\u1ee9 hai \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1ee9 6; 9:00 sáng \u0111\u1ebfn 5:00 chi\u1ec1u, và ngày th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y và ch\u1ee7 nh\u1eadt t\u1eeb 12:00 tr\u01b0a \u0111\u1ebfn 5:00 chi\u1ec1u
WPI Thông Báo M\u1edf R\u1ed9ng
KENTVILLE (16 tháng 3)- T\u1eadp \u0111oàn Westwood Properties (WPI), \u0111ang h\u1ee3p tác v\u1edbi chính ph\u1ee7 thành ph\u1ed1 Kentville, s\u1ebd xây d\u1ef1ng phát tri\u1ec3n khu dân c\u01b0 th\u1ee9 ba \u1edf Kentville. Khu dân c\u01b0 m\u1edbi phát tri\u1ec3n, Green Valley Court, s\u1ebd bao g\u1ed3m 150 c\u0103n nhà \u0111\u1ed9c l\u1eadp. Công vi\u1ec7c s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u vào tháng 4 và \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd hoàn thành trong 18 tháng. WPI s\u1ebd ch\u1ecbu 60% chi phí, trong khi s\u1ed1 còn l\u1ea1i s\u1ebd do chính ph\u1ee7 thành ph\u1ed1 ch\u1ecbu.
WPI \u0111ã t\u1ea1o d\u1ef1ng danh ti\u1ebfng cho vi\u1ec7c mang l\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng sinh ho\u1ea1t tho\u1ea3i mái v\u1edbi giá c\u1ea3 ph\u1ea3i ch\u0103ng. Khu dân c\u01b0 phát tri\u1ec3n hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a nó, Trang Viên Hillside và Lakeview Oaks, \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xây d\u1ef1ng cách \u0111ây 5 n\u0103m và \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u r\u1ea5t cao, v\u1edbi danh sách ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i dài.
Theo Helen Hart, m\u1ed9t giám \u0111\u1ed1c ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb c\u1ee7a WPI, Green Valley Court s\u1ebd n\u1eb1m cách khu kinh doanh 20 phút. Cô Hart c\u0169ng nói ti\u1ebfp là \"Green Valley Court s\u1ebd là n\u01a1i lý t\u01b0\u1edfng cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi v\u1ec1 h\u01b0u và nh\u1eefng ai mu\u1ed1n th\u01b0 giãn và ngh\u1ec9 ng\u01a1i sau m\u1ed9t ngày làm vi\u1ec7c ch\u0103m ch\u1ec9.\"<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is stated about Westwood Properties, Inc.?
childrens.answers: ["Its offices are open daily.","It lists available units online.","It offers hourly personal tours.","Its headquarters are located in Kentvitle."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nói v\u1ec1 T\u1eadp \u0111oàn Westwood Properties?<\/p>

A. V\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a nó m\u1edf c\u1eeda hàng ngày.<\/p>

B. Nó li\u1ec7t kê ra các \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb có s\u1eb5n tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn.<\/p>

C. Nó cung c\u1ea5p các tour du l\u1ecbch cá nhân theo gi\u1edd.<\/p>

D. Tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf chính c\u1ee7a nó n\u1eb1m \u1edf Kentville.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Sales agents are available at our offices to answer your questions Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, and on Saturday and Sunday from 12:00 noon to 5:00 PM<\/p>","en":"

What is stated about Westwood Properties, Inc.?<\/p>

A. Its offices are open daily.<\/p>

B. It lists available units online.<\/p>

C. It offers hourly personal tours.<\/p>

D. Its headquarters are located in Kentville.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Sales agents are available at our offices to answer your questions Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, and on Saturday and Sunday from 12:00 noon to 5:00 PM<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is NOT listed as a feature of the units at Lakeview Oaks?
childrens.answers: ["Recreational facilities","Laundry facilities","Covered parking","Hardwood flooring"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Cái gì không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1eb7c \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ee7a các \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb nhà \u1edf t\u1ea1i Lakeview Oaks?<\/p>

A. C\u01a1 s\u1edf gi\u1ea3i trí<\/p>

B. C\u01a1 s\u1edf gi\u1eb7t gi\u1ee7<\/p>

C. Bãi \u0111\u1ed7 xe<\/p>

D. Sàn g\u1ed7 c\u1ee9ng<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên thông tin:<\/p>

2- and 3-bedroom units with washer and dryer<\/p>

Swimming pool plus basketball and tennis courts<\/p>

Children's park nearby<\/p>

Hardwood floors<\/p>

Community laundry room on each floor<\/p>

Fitness center and outdoor swimming pool<\/p>

Chúng ta không th\u1ea5y có \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp chi ti\u1ebft trong (C) nên (C) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

What is NOT listed as a feature of the units at Lakeview Oaks?<\/p>

A. Recreational facilities<\/p>

B. Laundry facilities<\/p>

C. Covered parking<\/p>

D. Hardwood flooring<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the information:<\/p>

2- and 3-bedroom units with washer and dryer<\/p>

Swimming pool plus basketball and tennis courts<\/p>

Children's park nearby<\/p>

Hardwood floors<\/p>

Community laundry room on each floor<\/p>

Fitness center and outdoor swimming pool<\/p>

We see no mention of the detail in (C) so (C) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the article suggest about the units at Hillside Manor and Lakeview Oaks?
childrens.answers: ["They were built in eighteen months.","They were completed in April.","Many people find them expensive.","Many people want to live in them."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Bài báo g\u1ee3i ý \u0111i\u1ec1u gì v\u1ec1 các \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb nhà \u1edf t\u1ea1i Trang Viên Hillside và Lakeview Oaks?<\/p>

A. Chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xây d\u1ef1ng trong m\u01b0\u1eddi tám tháng.<\/p>

B. Chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn thành vào tháng t\u01b0.<\/p>

C. Nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi th\u1ea5y chúng \u0111\u1eaft ti\u1ec1n.<\/p>

D. Nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi mu\u1ed1n s\u1ed1ng \u1edf \u0111ó.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

WPI has built a reputation for providing comfortable living at affordable prices. Its current residential developments, Hillside Manor and Lakeview Oaks, were built five years ago and are much in demand, with long waiting lists.<\/p>","en":"

What does the article suggest about the units at Hillside Manor and Lakeview Oaks?<\/p>

A. They were built in eighteen months.<\/p>

B. They were completed in April.<\/p>

C. Many people find them expensive.<\/p>

D. Many people want to live in them.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

WPI has built a reputation for providing comfortable living at affordable prices. Its current residential developments, Hillside Manor and Lakeview Oaks, were built five years ago and are much in demand, with long waiting lists.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the article mention about Green Valley Court?
childrens.answers: ["It will contain two apartment buildings.","It will be managed by Ms. Hart.","Its construction costs will be partly paid for by the government.","It is restricted to people who have retired."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Bài báo \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp gì \u0111\u1ebfn Green Valley Court?<\/p>

A. Nó s\u1ebd ch\u1ee9a hai tòa nhà chung c\u01b0.<\/p>

B. Nó s\u1ebd do cô Hart qu\u1ea3n lý.<\/p>

C. Chi phí xây d\u1ef1ng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chính ph\u1ee7 tr\u1ea3 m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n.<\/p>

D. Nó h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã ngh\u1ec9 h\u01b0u.<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

The new development, Green Valley Court, will consist of 150 freestanding homes. Work will begin in April and is expected to be completed in eighteen months. WPI will bear 60 percent of the costs, while the remainder will be borne by the city government.<\/p>","en":"

What does the article mention about Green Valley Court?<\/p>

A. It will contain two apartment buildings.<\/p>

B. It will be managed by Ms. Hart.<\/p>

C. Its construction costs will be partly paid for by the government.<\/p>

D. It is restricted to people who have retired.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

The new development, Green Valley Court, will consist of 150 freestanding homes. Work will begin in April and is expected to be completed in eighteen months. WPI will bear 60 percent of the costs, while the remainder will be borne by the city government.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: How will Green Valley Court differ from the other two developments?
childrens.answers: ["It will allow residents to have pets.","It will be farther from the business district.","It will include special features for elderly residents.","It will allow people to buy homes as well as rent them."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Green Valley Court khác v\u1edbi hai khu phát tri\u1ec3n kia nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

A. Nó s\u1ebd cho phép c\u01b0 dân có v\u1eadt nuôi.<\/p>

B. Nó s\u1ebd cách xa khu kinh doanh h\u01a1n.<\/p>

C. Nó bao g\u1ed3m các \u0111\u1eb7c \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t dành cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi cao tu\u1ed5i.<\/p>

D. Nó s\u1ebd cho phép m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi mua nhà và c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 thuê nhà.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

So sánh v\u1edbi Trang Viên Hillside: \"Five minutes from the business district\", Lakeview Oaks: \"Ten minutes from business district\", ta có thông tin: \"According to Helen Hart, a marketing executive for WPI, Green Valley Court will be located twenty minutes from the business district.\", do \u0111ó, (B) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

How will Green Valley Court differ from the other two developments?<\/p>

A. It will allow residents to have pets.<\/p>

B. It will be farther from the business district.<\/p>

C. It will include special features for elderly residents.<\/p>

D. It will allow people to buy homes as well as rent them.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Compare to Hillside Manor: \"Five minutes from the business district\", Lakeview Oaks: \"Ten minutes from business district\", we have the information: \"According to Helen Hart, a marketing executive for WPI, Green Valley Court will be located twenty minutes from the business district.\", therefore, (B) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Dennis Maki
T\u1eeb: Nigella Smith
Ngày: Th\u1ee9 N\u0103m, ngày 8 tháng 11, 2:15 chi\u1ec1u.
Ch\u1ee7 \u0110\u1ec1: C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt
Dennis:
Tr\u01b0\u1edfng b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn k\u1ebf toán và bán hàng \u0111ã ch\u1ecdn ng\u01b0\u1eddi vào vòng chung k\u1ebft cho vi\u1ec7c \u1ee9ng tuy\u1ec3n công vi\u1ec7c \u1edf b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd t\u1ea1i Plumsted Aynes. Susan Tsai mu\u1ed1n m\u1eddi Marco Garcia và Danielle Jenkins quay l\u1ea1i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n l\u1ea7n hai cho v\u1ecb trí k\u1ebf toán, và Rajesh Kapoor mu\u1ed1n m\u1eddi Melanie Yu ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n l\u1ea7n hai cho v\u1ecb trí bán hàng y t\u1ebf.
Tôi mu\u1ed1n các anh g\u1ecdi cho nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi vào vòng chung k\u1ebft, lên l\u1ecbch ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n v\u1edbi h\u1ecd, và sau \u0111ó s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp \u0103n tr\u01b0a cho phù h\u1ee3p. Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng Susan s\u1ebd không \u1edf v\u0103n phòng vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi vì m\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb.
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì s\u1ef1 giúp \u0111\u1ee1 c\u1ee7a anh trong vi\u1ec7c tìm ki\u1ebfm cho \u0111\u1ebfn nay. Tôi \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t bi\u1ebft \u01a1n vì anh \u0111ã có th\u1ec3 làm vi\u1ec7c trong th\u1eddi gian ng\u1eafn nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf này khi tôi yêu c\u1ea7u anh s\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t các bu\u1ed5i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n ban \u0111\u1ea7u.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Nigella Smith
Giám \u0110\u1ed1c Ngu\u1ed3n Nhân L\u1ef1c<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Nigella Smith
T\u1eeb: Dennis Maki
Ngày: Th\u1ee9 N\u0103m, ngày 8 tháng 11, 3:52 chi\u1ec1u.
Ch\u1ee7 \u0110\u1ec1: Tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi: C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt
Nigella:
Tôi \u0111ã g\u1ecdi cho ba ng\u01b0\u1eddi vào vòng chung k\u1ebft. Hóa ra là chi\u1ec1u nay, Melanie Yu \u0111ã ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t công ty d\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ea9m, \u0111\u1ed1i th\u1ee7 c\u1ee7a chúng ta Granquist. Tôi \u0111ã thông báo cho Rajesh v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 ti\u1ebfn tri\u1ec3n này và anh ta nói ahh ta hy v\u1ecdng tìm \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi thay th\u1ebf thích h\u1ee3p.
Tôi \u0111ã xác nh\u1eadn m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n v\u1edbi anh Garcia vào th\u1ee9 ba, ngày 20 tháng 11. Tôi c\u0169ng s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp v\u1edbi công ty d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0103n u\u1ed1ng th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên cung c\u1ea5p b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a \u1edf \u0111ây. Th\u1eadt không may, cô Jenkins \u0111ã nh\u1eadp vi\u1ec7n g\u1ea7n \u0111ây, nên tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh nào v\u1edbi cô v\u1ec1 cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y.
Dennis Maki
Tr\u1ee3 Lý Hành Chính<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

KELOWNA (2 tháng 6)- M\u1ed9t doanh nghi\u1ec7p m\u1edbi \u0111ã cách m\u1ea1ng hóa b\u1eefa \u0103n \u1edf Kelowna. Fine Fresh Foods là m\u1ed9t d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 giao th\u1ee9c \u0103n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thành l\u1eadp cách \u0111ây m\u1ed9t n\u0103m b\u1edfi Kathryn Mishra. D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cho phép ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng lên m\u1ea1ng và xem hàng tr\u0103m công th\u1ee9c. H\u1ecd ch\u1ecdn nh\u1eefng công th\u1ee9c mà h\u1ecd thích cùng các thành ph\u1ea7n, h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn n\u1ea5u \u0103n, và chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao t\u1edbi cho h\u1ecd hàng tu\u1ea7n.
Cô Mishra \u0111\u1ea7u tiên ngh\u0129 ra ý t\u01b0\u1edfng này khi cô quan sát cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng b\u1eadn r\u1ed9n c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n bè. \"B\u1ea1n c\u1ee7a tôi quá b\u1eadn \u0111\u1ec3 lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch, mua s\u1eafm và n\u1ea5u \u0103n cho b\u1ea3n thân h\u1ecd,\" cô \u1ea5y gi\u1ea3i thích.\"H\u1ea7u h\u1ebft m\u1ed7i \u0111êm h\u1ecd s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn nhà hàng và mang \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n v\u1ec1. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 thì mu\u1ed1n n\u1ea5u \u0103n trong b\u1ebfp c\u1ee7a mình nh\u01b0ng l\u1ea1i không th\u1ea5y t\u1ef1 tin v\u1ec1 kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng n\u1ea5u n\u01b0\u1edbng.\"
Cô Mishra \u0111ã tìm ra cách \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ee3p lý hóa toàn b\u1ed9 quá trình kinh doanh. Fine Fresh Foods h\u1ee3p tác v\u1edbi các nhà cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng - th\u01b0\u1eddng là nh\u1eefng trang tr\u1ea1i nh\u1ecf - \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u ph\u1ea3i là mang tính h\u1eefu c\u01a1. M\u1ee5c tiên trong vi\u1ec7c h\u1ee3p tác v\u1edbi các \u0111\u1ed1i tác \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 s\u1ef1 ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i và giá c\u1ea3 h\u1ee3p lý c\u1ee7a d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5, \u0111ã làm cho doanh nghi\u1ec7p tr\u1edf nên c\u1ef1c k\u1ef3 n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng. Hi\u1ec7n nay, Fine Fresh Foods ch\u1ec9 giao hàng trong khu v\u1ef1c Kelowna, nh\u01b0ng vi\u1ec7c m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng sang các khu v\u1ef1c khác s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ho\u1ea1ch \u0111\u1ecbnh vào n\u0103m t\u1edbi.<\/p>

http:\/\/www.penningtonfarm.ca
Trang ch\u1ee7
S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m
Tin t\u1ee9c
Liên h\u1ec7
Nông tr\u1ea1i Pennington \u0111ang h\u1ee3p tác v\u1edbi Fine Fresh Foods! T\u1eeb khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c sáng l\u1eadp h\u01a1n 30 n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc, chúng tôi luôn s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ra nh\u1eefng lo\u1ea1i rau c\u1ee7 và trái cây ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao. Chúng tôi mong mu\u1ed1n giúp \u0111\u1ee1 Fine Fresh Foods v\u1edbi s\u1ee9 m\u1ec7nh c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd nh\u1eb1m cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng tác ph\u1ea9m \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c ngon mi\u1ec7ng có ngu\u1ed3n cung c\u1ea5p t\u1eeb các trang tr\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng nh\u01b0 chúng tôi.
Trái cây và rau qu\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a Pennington c\u0169ng có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mua \u1edf trang tr\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi b\u1ea3y ngày m\u1ed9t tu\u1ea7n t\u1eeb 9 gi\u1edd sáng \u0111\u1ebfn 2 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. Ngoài ra, chúng tôi bán s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1ea1i Ch\u1ee3 Nông dân Ph\u1ed1 Hardy m\u1ed7i sáng th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y và \u1edf C\u1eeda hàng T\u1ea1p hóa Russell su\u1ed1t c\u1ea3 tu\u1ea7n.<\/p>

http:\/\/www.finefreshfoods.ca\/orderform
Fine Fresh Foods
M\u1eabu Giao hàng
Tên: Darren Soun
\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 email: dsoun@email.ca
S\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i: 250-555-0193
Công th\u1ee9c \u0111ã ch\u1ecdn: #11 - Gà xào rau c\u1ee7 (4 ph\u1ea7n)
#32 Th\u0103n nõn l\u1ee3n v\u1edbi m\u0103ng tây (4 ph\u1ea7n)
#56 Súp rau c\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ea1i m\u1ea1ch (2 ph\u1ea7n)
T\u1ed5ng ti\u1ec1n: $50.00 (Thanh toán b\u1eb1ng th\u1ebb tín d\u1ee5ng v\u1edbi s\u1ed1 \u0111uôi 4873)
Ngày và th\u1eddi gian giao hàng: Th\u1ee9 ba, ngày 13 tháng 6, lúc 6 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u<\/p>"}

childrens.explains:

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì là s\u1ef1 th\u1eadt v\u1ec1 Nông tr\u1ea1i Penninqton?<\/p>

Pennington Farm is teaming up with Fine Fresh Foods! Since our founding over 30 years ago, we have always produced high-quality fruits and vegetables. We look forward to helping Fine Fresh Foods in its mission to provide delicious culinary creations sourced from local farms like ours.<\/p>","en":"

Pennington Farm is teaming up with Fine Fresh Foods! Since our founding over 30 years ago, we have always produced high-quality fruits and vegetables. We look forward to helping Fine Fresh Foods in its mission to provide delicious culinary creations sourced from local farms like ours.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Kate Millerson
T\u1eeb: Daniel Friedman
Ngày: 25 Tháng 1
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n nhóm t\u1eadp trung s\u1eafp t\u1edbi
Chào Kate,
Cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n nhóm t\u1eadp trung ti\u1ebfp theo \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1eed nghi\u1ec7m ý t\u01b0\u1edfng lo\u1ea1i th\u1ee9c u\u1ed1ng có h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb trái cây m\u1edbi s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c vào ngày 1 tháng 2 t\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng Greenville. Mari Kobayashi s\u1ebd ch\u1ee7 trì nó.
Xin vui lòng thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf b\u1ea3ng th\u0103m dò \u0111\u1ec3 thu th\u1eadp ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i các nhóm b\u1eb1ng cách s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m\u1eabu cô \u0111ã t\u1ea1o vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc làm m\u1eabu và g\u1eedi cho Mari. Sau khi cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n nhóm t\u1eadp trung di\u1ec5n ra, vui lòng \u0111\u1ebfm l\u1ea1i k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 d\u01b0\u1edbi d\u1ea1ng bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u1ed3. Tôi c\u1ea7n k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p thông tin này vào báo cáo hàng tháng c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111\u1ec3 n\u1ed9p cho tr\u01b0\u1edfng phòng ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb.
Cám \u01a1n,
Daniel<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Daniel Friedman
T\u1eeb: Kate Millerson
Ngày: 3 Tháng 2
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: K\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n nhóm t\u1eadp trung \u1edf Greenville
\u0110ính kèm: K\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 \u1edf Greenville
Chào, Daniel
Theo Mari Kobayashi, 25 trong s\u1ed1 30 ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia \u0111\u0103ng ký cho Greenville \u0111ã n\u1ebfm th\u1eed và hoàn thành b\u1ea3n th\u0103m dò. K\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu gi\u1ed1ng v\u1edbi k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a nhóm t\u1eadp trung vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Tuy nhiên, Mari \u0111ã l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn nh\u1ea5t trong nhóm Greenville là m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec1u b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd.
Theo yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a anh, k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 l\u1eadp thành b\u1ea3ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ính kèm trong \u0111ây. Xin hãy cho tôi bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu anh c\u1ea7n thêm thông tin gì cho báo cáo c\u1ee7a mình v\u1edbi Acosta ho\u1eb7c n\u1ebfu cô \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n xem các bình lu\u1eadn trên b\u1ea3ng th\u0103m dò.
Kate<\/p>

Ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n Nhóm t\u1eadp trung Greenville
Ngày 1 tháng 2
(Nh\u1eefng con s\u1ed1 cho th\u1ea5y bao nhiêu ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia thích gì \u1edf m\u1ed7i tùy ch\u1ecdn.)
Lo\u1ea1i th\u1ee9c u\u1ed1ng: Có ga (8) Không ga (17)
S\u1eb5n sàng tr\u1ea3 giá cao nh\u1ea5t: $1.25 (5)
$1.50 (12)
$2.00 (5)
$2.50 (3)
H\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb: Anh \u0111ào (2)
Chanh (7)
Chanh lá cam(13)
Cam (3)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In the first e-mail, what is indicated about Ms. Millerson?
childrens.answers: ["She has designed questionnaires before.","She will lead a focus group on February 1.","She will interview Ms. Kobayashi.","She has been transferred to the Greenville office."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Trong b\u1ee9c e-mail \u0111\u1ea7u tiên, \u0111i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 cô Millerson?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf b\u1ea3ng th\u0103m dò tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây.<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd ch\u1ee7 trì cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n nhóm t\u1eadp trung vào ngày 1 tháng 2.<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n cô Kobayashi.<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng Greenville.<\/p>###

Thông tin:<\/p>

Please design a questionnaire to collect the group's feedback using the one you created last month as a template and send it over to Mari.<\/p>","en":"

In the first e-mail, what is indicated about Ms. Millerson?<\/p>

A. She has designed questionnaires before.<\/p>

B. She will lead a focus group on February 1.<\/p>

C. She will interview Ms. Kobayashi.<\/p>

D. She has been transferred to the Greenville office.<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Please design a questionnaire to collect the group's feedback using the one you created last month as a template and send it over to Mari.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does Mr. Friedman say he will do with Ms. Millerson’s data?
childrens.answers: ["Distribute it to his staff","Show it to a new client","Include it in a report","Write an article based on it"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Anh Friedman nói anh \u1ea5y s\u1ebd làm gì v\u1edbi d\u1eef li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a cô Millerson?<\/p>

A. Phân phát cho nhân viên c\u1ee7a anh ta<\/p>

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

After the focus group takes place, please tally the results in the form of a chart. I need to incorporate this information into my monthly report to the chief marketing officer.<\/p>","en":"

What does Mr. Friedman say he will do with Ms. Millerson’s data?<\/p>

A. Distribute it to his staff<\/p>

B. Show it to a new client<\/p>

C. Include it in a report<\/p>

D. Write an article based on it<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

After the focus group takes place, please tally the results in the form of a chart. I need to incorporate this information into my monthly report to the chief marketing officer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Who most likely is Ms. Acosta?
childrens.answers: ["The director of Human Resources","The chief marketing officer","A focus group leader","An information technology expert"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Cô Acosta có th\u1ec3 là ai?<\/p>

A. Giám \u0111\u1ed1c Ngu\u1ed3n Nhân l\u1ef1c<\/p>

B. Tr\u01b0\u1edfng phòng ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb<\/p>

C. Nhóm tr\u01b0\u1edfng nhóm t\u1eadp trung<\/p>

D. Chuyên gia công ngh\u1ec7 thông tin<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

After the focus group takes place, please tally the results in the form of a chart. I need to incorporate this information into my monthly report to the chief marketing officer.<\/p>

Per your request, the tabulated results are attached. Please let me know if you will need additional information for your report to Ms. Acosta or if she wants to see the comments on the questionnaires.<\/p>","en":"

Who most likely is Ms. Acosta?<\/p>

A. The director of Human Resources<\/p>

B. The chief marketing officer<\/p>

C. A focus group leader<\/p>

D. An information technology expert<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

After the focus group takes place, please tally the results in the form of a chart. I need to incorporate this information into my monthly report to the chief marketing officer.<\/p>

Per your request, the tabulated results are attached. Please let me know if you will need additional information for your report to Ms. Acosta or if she wants to see the comments on the questionnaires.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

http:\/\/www.zabokahaiti.ht
Ti\u1ebfng Pháp \/ Ti\u1ebfng Anh
Nhà Khách Zaboka
S\u1ed1 99 rue hibbert, Pétion-Ville, Haiti
Nhà khách Zaboka, n\u1eb1m trong nh\u1eefng ng\u1ecdn \u0111\u1ed3i phía trên thành ph\u1ed1 th\u1ee7 \u0111ô Port-au-Prince c\u1ee7a Haiti, chi\u1ebfm b\u1ed1n t\u1ea7ng cao nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t tòa nhà l\u1ed9ng l\u1eaby trong m\u1ed9t khu l\u1ecbch s\u1eed. Nhà khách c\u1ee7a chúng tôi n\u1eb1m \u1edf trung tâm và ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111i m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i ng\u1eafn là \u0111\u1ebfn ch\u1ee3, nhà hàng, phòng tr\u01b0ng bày ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt, và h\u1ed9p \u0111êm.
Chi ti\u1ebft:
- Các ti\u1ec7n nghi bao g\u1ed3m internet không dây, phòng b\u1ebfp, và kho l\u01b0u tr\u1eef hành lý.
- T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 khách \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0103n m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa sáng phong cách Haiti mi\u1ec5n phí kèm cà phê tr\u1ed3ng \u1edf \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng.
- Giá phòng m\u1ed9t \u0111êm là $45 cho m\u1ed7i khách ($15 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tính tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ea3m vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1eb7t phòng; nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi còn l\u1ea1i ph\u1ea3i thanh toán khi \u0111\u1ebfn).
- B\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111\u0103ng ký phòng lúc 1:00 chi\u1ec1u ; thanh toán phòng không tr\u1ec5 h\u01a1n 11:30 sáng.
- \u1ede l\u1ea1i 2 \u0111êm t\u1ed1i thi\u1ec3u.
- Nhóm \u0111\u1ebfn sau 7:00 t\u1ed1i s\u1ebd ch\u1ecbu phí \u0111\u0103ng ký phòng \u0111êm khuya v\u1edbi giá $5.00 cho m\u1ed7i l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1eb7t.<\/p>

http:\/\/ www.travelfair.com
Pétion-Ville, Haiti: Nhà Khách Zaboka
\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng b\u1edfi Wilford Gaines vào ngày 7 tháng 10
Tôi \u0111ã \u1edf t\u1ea1i Nhà khách Zaboka 3 \u0111êm vào tháng t\u01b0. Có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 khách s\u1ea1n khác trong khu v\u1ef1c, nh\u01b0ng theo quan \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ee7a tôi, \u0111ây ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn là l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t v\u1ec1 ph\u1ea1m vi giá c\u1ea3. Sân trong nh\u1ed9n nh\u1ecbp và nhà b\u1ebfp t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 l\u1edbn là m\u1ed9t môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p các v\u1ecb khách khác. \u0110ây là khía c\u1ea1nh yêu thích c\u1ee7a tôi t\u1ea1i \u0111ây không nghi ng\u1edd gì c\u1ea3. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ây vào bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i, hãy \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng b\u1ea1n nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mã \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eadp vào bàn phím chìa khóa \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u1edf c\u1eeda, vì l\u1ed1i vào t\u1ea7ng tr\u1ec7t s\u1ebd b\u1ecb khóa sau 7 gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i. \u0110ây không ph\u1ea3i là \u0111i\u1ec1u tôi \u0111ã nh\u1eadn ra, nên tôi ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ee3i m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi gian ng\u1eafn \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cho vào. Ngoài vi\u1ec7c \u0111ó ra thì tôi r\u1ea5t thích th\u1eddi gian \u1edf l\u1ea1i \u0111ây!<\/p>
